title: Delicious tea, for tea lovers
text: If you are a tea lover , this is the place to visit in Thessaloniki. Great variety, nice atmosphere, perfect service.

title: Tasty croissants
text: The place has incredible decoration, very unique for this city. I ordered a freddo espresso, which I liked very much, and two small croissants. I went there to drink coffee, but the croissants won my heart. Before I leave, I took another two for home....More

title: WOW!
text: Store and cafe - 5/5. Food and food presentation - 5/5. Staff and owner - 100/5. Easily one of the nicest places we have ever came across during our travels in Greece. The hospitality and friendliness of the owner and the staff is matched by...More

title: Awesome place!
text: The staff was amazing, the tea sublime and the ambience great! I got the yerba mate and then came back the next day for an iced vanilla matcha latte. Both teas were so good I didn't feel like doing anything except drinking and enjoying the experience

title: Great pastry and sandwich shop
text: Went to this shop out of curiosity and to try some pastry with feta and something sweet. The quality is there, the staff are helpful and they also offered some pastries on the house.

title: Amazing
text: Amazing food, sun is up was delicious and the think pink pancake were mins blowing Great service, the staff was very friendly and spoke great english

title: Detox
text: To Tsai is a wonderful place, calm, quiet, relaxing music, very friendly staff, great variety of teas - warm recommendations!

title: Fantastic delicious and healthy food
text: The Koukos tiropitaki is a place where you can find delicious food any time of the day. You can choose between many greek traditional pitas, Greek pies, pastries and round bread roll from Thessaloniki. You can your amazing coffee, americano, frappé or freddo espresso and even the traditional greek coffee. Koukos tiropitaki is a very clean place and has clean and modern toilets. If you ever travel to Thessaloniki Koukos tiropitaki is a MUST place to visit.

title: The pinkest bar in Thessaloniki
text: I spent three days with my friends in Thessaloniki and we spent two of those days here whishing that we could have had even more time to try everything on the menu. Be sure that anything you choose will be just amazing and dont get me started on the service… the guys are just so polite and friendly and the place looks really good and chic. If you are looking for a brunch place this is just a must go spot here!

title: Very good experience
text: It is a non smoking shop. The Professionel is very polite. In general it's a very good place to visit with friends family or alone.

title: Freshly baked sandwiches!
text: Freshly baked sandwiches! (In the evening!!) Nice coffee, friendly staff, pet friendly, recycle friendly

title: Best breakfast
text: The food was very good and friendly  Best breakfast in Thessaloniki Pancakes are the bomb! Definitely a visit worth when you are here

title: Best break
text: Any kind of tea, hot or cold, all delicious. Heat survival iced tea (I recommend you ask for regular strong, black, with lemon and honey). Friendly staff. Go!

title: Best coffee in Thessaloniki
text: Lovely people, feels very warm and comfy. Delicious salads, excellent coffee! Keep going Koukos 🤩🤩

title: Perfect Time
text: We had a lovely moment at Judah Club! We loved the juices and the pancakes ! People inside are very nice, and helpful! Thx to Savvas and is tips!

title: Best The-place
text: This is one of the best the-places I’ve been to! If you like the then this is the place to visit. Buy the with you and one really nice the is the Japanese Bancha or Jasmine. Or just sit down and relax with a great cup of the.

title: Love it.
text: Very friendly stuff and amazing products. Try the sesame bagel with tahini and the handmade bars. These are my favorite ones. But not only. Everything are handmade and from good ingredients.

title: Amazing Food and Shopping
text: Wonderful experience, exceptionally polite stuff, grate food. The place is decorated inredibly, brings beautiful vibes. Furthermore you can find clothing on the inside. It's definately something else.

title: My favorite tea shop!
text: No smoking aloud! Friendly environment! Friendly employees! Many tea choices! You can buy tea for home! Also teapots....amazing!!! Nice decor! Music a bit loud for me but you can have conversation without yelling!!! It’s a gem of the city center! Convenient for a break from cite seeing or shopping! Truly great for tea lovers! I am one of them and I am difficult to please!

title: Loved the sandwiches
text: It’s beautifully decorated, feels very warm and comfy. It has a really nice variety of foods. The sandwiches are so tasty and there are some unique options. I can feel full just by eating one of them and it stays that way for hours. The staff was very very kind. They also offer delivery wooo

title: Breakfast of Champions.
text: They say breakfast is the most important meal of the day, and no questions about it Judah Club is the place to have it. My girl had the Red Forrest pancakes and I an egg dish similar to a “Benedict.” DELICIOUS! Considering this is my first time reviewing a place speaks volumes. ENJOY!

title: Tea for dreaming!!!
text: The best place to rest your mind! More kinds of tea than you ever thought exist!!! You should definitely try it.

title: Bakery
text: very good quality and friendly staff. Very nice coffee to start your day and excellent breakfast with fair prices. It also includes delivery service

title: You must try the pancakes! So tasty
text: Ordered Oreo and Think Pink and they were AMAZING. the order was fast and soooo good, but it's too much food and we couldn't finish all

title: Exceptional place!
text: Wide variety of teas, homemade cakes, chocolate soufflé, salads, warm and cosy atmosphere. Also the staff was very helpfull, informed and kind :)

title: Freshly baked
text: Best quality, freshly baked delicacies, friendly atmosphere. Suggested all year round. Suggested to families with children too

title: Delicious brunch!
text: It’s a little bit of a walk from the centre but well worth it. Service was attentive and friendly - the food was delicious!

title: Macha Tea
text: Exceptional place, with perfect decoration, top quality service and advanced philosophy. Dont miss it!

title: Great for breakfast
text: If you are looking for a place with great pastries, cakes, and coffee, you have to come here! Beautiful little shop right downtown.

title: Awful taste
text: I ordered Crack the egg which is a savory dish served with maple syrup. It was a terrible combination. We also ordered sweet pancakes which came with a sour cream in the middle so that was a failed dish as well. We did not even eat half of it. I would not go again. And definitely not recommend.

title: Best tea shop in Thessaloniki.
text: Very good and wide variety of tea. Cosy environment, warm service, friendly people. The decoration adorable.

title: Must visit
text: Great choices for breakfast or lunch to take away mainly. Snacks, pies, sandwiches, salads all freshly made or baked.

title: yummy yummy yummy!
text: One of the best brunch places i ve ever visited! Such delicious dishes ,great service!Excellent coffee! I will definately visit again !

title: Best variety and quality i have ever seen!
text: The place was great and in the center of Thessaloniki. There was a great variety of teas and hopefully someone to explain to you...For the kids they had fresh natural juices and nice sandwiches.

title: The quality of the food along with the service is simply amazing!
text: When you enter initially, the employees welcome me and are very polite. When I bought the Greek food called Tyropitakia, It was so fresh and tasty, I didn't bought tyropitakia from anywhere else. Again, the quality and freshness of their food is not comparable with other places. The amount you pay is well worth it!! Also, I asked if they could add honey to my yogurt with oatmeal, which was not a option or on the menu, however they did with a smile!  Thank you Koukos!!

title: The best place in town
text: Fantastic food and the best service in town!!! MUST ORDER the snicker pancakes, they are divine!!! The environment is very friendly and colorful that makes your day!!!! The best place in town...

title: Perfect tea experience!
text: If you are a tea or coffee lover, this is the right place for you! With a big variety of tea flavors from all around the world and combined with something sweet or salty to eat.....Just perfect.....

title: Koukos
text: One of the best places for breakfast in the city, everything is homemade and delicious!! Worth a visit for sure!

title: THE BEST IN SALONIC !!
text: Excellent location, impeccable service, 10 for food every time. Everything was perfect!! Very attentive waiters!

title: Magical place for self-charge
text: Beautiful small coffee and tea place where you can really just relax and drink your coffee and enjoy solitude. Try freddo espresso with orange and milk! Mmm.. if you are tea lover you can enjoy in any taste you can imagine. And you can also buy gorgeous tea pots. Stuff is really pleasant and always smiling. Big plus !!

title: Lovely, fresh breads and pastries
text: Whether choosing bread, croissants or pies for breakfast, you won’t be disappointed. Everything is wonderfully fresh. It’s popular which is a sign how good it is. Friendly and helpful staff. Good coffee too.

title: Long Sunday service
text: We came here because this place was in top 5 in all ratings. And I didn't understand, why. There were only 2 more visitors except of us. We waited for the dishes 40 (!) minutes. As for the food: very big and... not tasty for me. If you don't like sugary food, think about another place for breakfast. The only thing that prevented me from "terrible" mark were great fruit shakes. Really tasty and healthy

title: The biggest variety of tea
text: Very beautiful place to be with your friends or alone. Big variety of tea. Affordable prices. Near To the city centre, accessible with buses or foot.

title: Delicious sweets pie and other local deserds.Good prices.The staff was Very kind.Everything is home made as we told.
text: Delicious sweets pie and other local deserds.Good prices.The staff was Very kind.Everything is home made as we told.

title: Unbelievably long serving
text: Unbelievably long serving for the place serving breakfasts - more than 40 minutes waiting order to be served

title: Super cozy tea place in Thessaloniki
text: Excellent quality and a huge variety of teas! The staff was very kind and helpful and they also gave you dried fruits along with small pieces of cake with your tea. Will definitely go back!

title: Worth a visit
text: After reading the reviews we decided to try it. Everything we tried was fresh and tasty, prices are fair and the staff are friendly. Recommended

title: Hip & delicious!
text: A hidden gem on a boring street. That's this place with amazing breakfast, pancakes, good coffees & smoothies! Even the pink toilet is a must see ;-). We had a delicious breakfast here. Would definitily come back the next time we are in town!More

title: Magical
text: I fell in love with this delicious smell the moment I entered the place. It’s cosy and warm here. I’m not a profound specialist, but still can tell that the tea was great. I’ve even bought some to take home. Staff is helpful and friendly.

title: Best pastries in Thessaloniki!
text: Pretty much everything is perfect there: sandwiches, koulouri, sweets. Big variety, top quality and great service! Honestly, an everyday addiction.

title: The reviews are not wrong, this place is fantastic.
text: Service was excellent, prices were very reasonable, portions were generous and food was amazing. It was an absolutely faultless visit here for our family of four, we had an eclectic mixture of plates from yogurt to pancakes to scrambled eggs. Everything tasted lovely and was very well presented. We'll definitely return when we next visit Thessaloniki.

title: A very cosy place for you!
text: “To tsai “ is a very good tee and coffee drink place with a lot of different sandwiches and a very lovely atmosphere! The service is excellent and always with a smile on a face! A place to visit with your friend.

title: The most yummy pastries in town
text: Elegant place with delicious pastry, desserts, salads and more. Very friendly personnel and the place is very clean, neat and inviting. Highly recommended

title: Too expensive for fast food
text: 3 sandwiches and pancakes for 30e is definitely toi expensive however food tastes good. Service is polite

title: Subsequent visit was disappointing
text: Having returned to Thessaloniki, I was eager to go back to this cafe for some good tea. This time, the tea was not great; the quantity of the tea leafs was not much and the overall flavor of the tea was bland. For the price that the cafe is charging (more than the nearby cafes), it was disappointing to see this quality of tea being served. Not to mention that the service was terrible. Not a cafe that I would return again.

title: Delicious food and drinks!
text: Now we all know Thessaloniki has great places to eat and drink. But this place really made a difference on quality and price level! Due to the numerous bakeries in town, we never went twice to the same place, except for this one! Highly recommended. Cheers, Ms & Mr T

title: Perfect
text: Really tasty breakfast (the "crack the egg" pancakes were super delicious). Service was also very nice. Thank You! ;)

title: All day relaxed tea place (free of smoke!!)
text: Ideal place for a tea with friends or family! Nice atmosphere all day long, from first tea of the day until a glass of wine at night. Friendly and helpful staff! An enormous tea selection to take home or offer as gift to friends!

title: The best koulouri in town!
text: If you want the best "koulouri" , pite with chesse or croissant with chocolate, you must visit it! Friendly stuff.

title: Great Experience !
text: Excellent service great atmosphere ..The club was close to our hotel we have seen the atmosphere and the we were conquered by the everything . The waiters were great ! Great !

title: Nice one between cofee shope and restaurant
text: Atmosphere is terrific. Food taste very good Service second to nothing. Colorful dishes. What else can you ask? Beautiful place to start the morning and continue in the evening. Well done!!!

title: Great Breakfast Variety
text: I stay just around the corner and visit them on a daily basis! Huge variety of traditional Greek pastries, very friendly guys! Definitely worth trying more than once!

title: Pancakes wins!
text: Very nice service. Pancakes are incredible. Size of dishes is larger than expected. Love this place

title: Yes to tea house!!!
text: Yes, finally a tea house in Greece! Been looking for a place solely dedicated to serving tea and this tea house certainly have plenty of selection! Lots of organic options! Great calm atmosphere to study and/or relax with friends. Bonus: the bathroom have clean towels for after washing of hands, awesome way to eliminate paper waste! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

title: Friendly spot
text: Nice atmosphere , very very friendly staff , excellent quality products. Very good experience we WILL have again. We believe , breakfast must be a good experience!!!

title: Great brunch
text: Judah club is a really great restaurant in the center of Thessaloniki with a modern look. The place serves excellent and healthy food and beaverages, such as juices, salads or açaí bowls. Ideal for lunch or breakfast! Besides the food, the service is good, and the atmosphere is really nice.

title: The definition of a tee place
text: Great variety (you will need time to flip through the menu and decide). Good service. Rooibos iced tee with orange highly recommended!

title: Great bakery in Thessaloniki
text: Great little bakery with wide variety of delicious freshly baked pastry. And friendly staff too. Highly recommended!

title: beautiful place, very good service
text: Really cozy place, beautiful colours and everything. We ordered a strawberry yogurt super bowl and red forest pancakes, both were very good. But, inside the pancakes (after we ate half portion) we found a piece of nylon, we informed the waitress (She was really kind) who apologised to us and asked if we want something else. Due to what happened drinks were on the house!

title: Inspiring aromas and flavors!
text: If you want to enjoy a huge variety of special kinds of tea in a quiet, non-smoking environment listening to soft jazzy tunes, then this is the place for you!this is the tea lovers paradise! but also offers exceptional beverage of belgium chocolate. One of my favorite teas is the "fotia sto kamini" and also the ones with the flowers that open inside the cup! you can also buy tea and other tea products such as tea biscuits etc.you'll find the stuff very helpful, smiling and knowledgeable

title: Lovely bakery with very friendly staff
text: We stopped by this place for a mid-afternoon snack and the staff could not have been more friendly.  We tried a traditional Christmas treat (apologies the name escapes me) and some Rum and Poppy Seed Cake which was so moist it was delicious.  The coffee was also great but what was particularly impressive was the lengths that the staff would go to help us try new things.  Highly recommend you drop by, particularly if you have a sweet tooth.

title: Amazing!
text: AMAZING brunch restaurant with delicious, high-quality and decadent foods to choose from! Highly recommend the eggs w/guacamole & salmon for a healthy choice and the snickers pancakes for a sweet treat. The food is presented so beautifully, you have to take a photo of it before diving in! Portion sizes also great, we left feeling very full. You can tell a lot of love and care goes into preparing each dish. The staff is extra kind and helpful, we really appreciated it. The best experience for anyone looking for the perfect brunch spot in Thessaloniki!

title: A secret lovely relaxing place to have a lunch or tea or even coffee
text: We tried almost everything from food to desert, different exotic and traditional tea and coffee. All delicious and of the best quality.

title: Our opinion
text: Perfect cheespies. Our child prefers it for many years. They have standard quality on every product. Is recomended especially during summer walks.

title: Very cool place
text: The food and drinks were very tasty. Really good service and a very modern/tropical vibe. Loved fhe whole experience there!

title: Special, uplifting, and...green!!
text: A cosy, warm environment with excellent service. Specialises in tea, but offers a great variety of other options as well. Staff's smiley, friendly, and more than informative! A must for tea-lovers; a must for those who appreciate good taste.

title: Tasty Pastry!!
text: Very impressed with the large variety of freshly baked sweet and savoury pastries. The staff were very helpful in choosing a combination of pastries for our tastebuds. If you are tahini lover you must try the tahini koulouri. A must visit in Thesaloniki!!

title: Amazing & tasty
text: Amazing food in very stylish place. Staff is super nice. Intresting unusual dishes :)) Wonderful for branch or breakfast.

title: Great place
text: One of my favorite places in Thessaloniki. Great variety of teas, interesting and creative tidbits (they even have their own handmade bread). Order tips: tea Theiko thavma and homemade lemonade with red fruit tea. Very pleasant surrounding, ideal for quiet meetings with your friends and studying. Very clean (their toilet is actually a must see), very pleasant owners and staff. This place is definitely a must if you are visiting Thessaloniki!

title: The only spot for breakfast!
text: Thessaloníki has hundreds of spots for coffee! BUT Koukos is the spot for breakfast! Many varieties of “koulouri”, sweet and savory with the family favorite being the tahini koulouri! Great bougatsa, bars and coffee as well. We had breakfast here every morning!

title: BEST BRUNCH EVER
text: I promise you this is the place to go! This place is great! Great food, great service, great view! Good price as well.  I had the french toast and berries bowl  The staff are absolutely amazing, helping me out and even had an English menu!!. I will be telling everyone about this place and will visit one more time before I leave Thessaloníki.  One of the staff members gave me recommendations, told me what parts of the city to be careful at and just asked how my stay has been.  Cannot recommend them enough, they truly made my birthday!

title: Again and Again and Again
text: We didn't really know what that place was until we decided to go. If you are a coffee lover only you'll hate this place for sure. I love coffee but I am always open in trying new things. It's a place primarily for tea and I LOVED it. We went there with a huge group of friends and we all wanted coffee. The waiter insisted in trying a cup of tea each and every one and she said that if we didn't like it she would bring us coffee and we wouldn't have to pay. Well, it was a deal. She helped us pick a tea and she brought it in like 5 minutes (she was SO kind to all 10 of us). We literally LOVED every single sip of the tea we tasted, NO we didn't buy coffee at all. By the time we were drinking it we were making weird noses and the whole store could hear our surprise in what we were tasting. It wasn't really expensive, and even if it was trust me it was worth EVERY CENT. We actually bought some tea on our way out to try new things in our houses and we LOVED it all again.

title: Great place, great coffee
text: Had breakfast here every day during my stay in Thessaloniki! Friendly staff, espresso tasted so good and their yoghurt w/ honey is excellent!

title: yummy brunch-cool atmosphere
text: nice n luminous environment, yummy food options and attentive service. Taste the single origin coffees

title: Best tea in Greece
text: One of the best shops in which you can have your tea (obviously) coffee or chocolate in Thessaloniki! Many flavors, many different sweets and toasts, always fresh and baked the moment you order them. My favorite tea taste is the "White Angel". Also very tasty the "fire in kamini" especially during winter.

title: Best choco souffle
text: A very nice place, with a great service. The choco souffle is the best I've ever eaten, with a soft and smooth texture and an intense taste of chocolate. And the cheese pastry are soft, full of cheese, they practically melt in your mouth. This place is on my map next time I'll come back to Thessaloniki.

title: Not to be missed
text: Today was the second time we have visited this lovely quirky cafe/boutique. We had the most amazing food for very good price. This place is great for breakfast/brunch or early evening meals. It does have a small menu, but what it lacks in size it certainly doesn’t lack in quality/presentation and flavours. The staff are really lovely and friendly cafe and boutique alike. They have some great choices of fashion at very good prices. In fact on both these occasions I bought two dresses. Today was my birthday and after having a really good conversation with the owner Savvas, who gave us some great tips on restaurants and bars was given a lovely slice of cake and a present for my birthday. We can only say if you do not visit this establishment on your trip to Thessaloniki you have missed out on a real little gem. And we have been all over the world so we can speak with real confidence.

title: Breakfast
text: Came hear on the recommendation from trip adviser So glad we did, service great, food excellent and loved the whole experience of pouring the tea Great start to the day Totally Will recommend it Chico

title: Great place for breakfast
text: Convenient to where we stayed. Quick, excellent selection, great coffee and fresh squeezed OJ for great price

title: In love
text: Best service and food. Really enjoyed our breakfast and very nice concept store! Totally in love especially cuz it’s vegan friendly!!!

title: Unique place
text: What a gem! Congrats to the people who made this a reality in Salonica. In the middle of the city but away from the noise. The service is excellent, the staff really eager to help and explain. A large selection of tea choices that can...More

title: Best in town !
text: You can’t miss this place ! The only problem is that you want to buy everything ! All day fresh . Must Koulouri Thessalonikis

title: One of the best brunches ever!
text: One of the best brunches ever! The pancakes were amazing and a lot to fill my tummy. The eggs were also the best. The staff was so friendly and helpful. Especially the owner Savvas. He came to talk to us and gave us recommendations for...More

title: A haven
text: In the city of a thousand and one cafes, this place caught my eye because although centrally located near the main shopping streets, it is far classier than most. It is also peaceful, the service flawless and the cappuccino freddo as it should be (although they market themselves mainly as a tea house). I cannot fail to mention the cleanliness, it is exceptional. The owner and staff obviously take a great deal of pride in what they do, and do it impeccably.

title: Fresh and tasty
text: All products are fresh, baked in their oven and really tasty! The place is clean and the personnel is always polite and smiling.

title: Yes Yes Yes.
text: Yes Yes Yes. Creativity at its best. Perfect combination to all in the store. Fashion, coffee, pancakes, workspace, music, design, layout, acoustics. Congratulations to the contributors. Recommended and will revisit.

title: Calm and lovely place
text: Calm and lovely place. Best tea ever. Amazing salat. Amazing hot chocolate. Nice staff. Good wifi. Everything is affordable.

title: Nice variety of snacks
text: We took take away stuff. Original tastes, cheese pies and things at the city center. I recommend it though

title: Very good food and staff.
text: We came to eat and drink something refreshing. Very good sandwich with mushrooms and great banoffe pancakes. Staff very nice. We love the decor as well.

title: They have Mate!
text: I was looking at black teas from China or India and green teas from Japan or China until I found Mate tea that I have missed for the past 6 months of my travels because I had forgotten the utensils at home. The tea was served traditionally with the exception that all the water was already in the mate instead of a thermos to pour it from. With it came dried fruits and some nice baked goods. All together left me very very happy!

title: Refreshing sandwiches and orange juice
text: We took 2 sandwiches, one with nuts and the other with salami, both had nice feta cheese inside and salad. They cost 3e. Orange juice is very nice, made it fresh in front of you, 3dl for just 2e. So you can have very nice fresh food and juice for few money. They also have some pasteries and pizza that looked nice. Interior is modern, seating is outside.

title: Simply great
text: An amazing place, with amazing food and the best staff ever!!!! We ordered both sweet and savory and all the dishes were to die for!!! Love it!!!!!!

title: The best thing you can do after a long walk in the city!
text: This is really one of my personal favourites in my hometown. Their tea variety is marvelous, always providing you something new to choose. Except tea, you can drink hot chocolates with unique tastes. The prices are really nice too! All in all, one of the best places to relax in Thessaloniki!

title: Always fresh and friendly.
text: We have our favorite meal with Koukos. When looking for a good start of the day we always go to Koukos. Their egg dishes start our day the best way possible. The food is delicious and their portions generous. This restaurant is one of a kind in Thessaloniki.

title: More than I expected
text: We looked for a nice restaurant near the hotel and entered one that looked fine. We gave it 100% Very good!

title: A quiet, cozy and non-smoking place in the heart of the city
text: The moment one steps in, it's like entering another dimension, away from the noise and the stress of the busy and crowded city centre. The service was excellent and the available tea choices can satisfy even the most demanding costumer. Moreover it's a non-smoking place, something quite difficult to find in Greece. Definately a place to visit after a long day!

title: Homemade
text: A lovely spot in the center of Thessaloniki, a bakery for everything you want to taste, sweet and salty!! Everything home made with the best ingridients. Every time we passed by had to make a quick stop, excellent!! Bravo!

title: Very nice and cheap breakfast,
text: Very nice and cheap breakfast, awesome setting. Amazing staff. Must go for Thessaloniki if you are in the area, even the shopowner is interested in you and helping you out when you need advise

title: Thessaloniki's Best TeaRoom
text: Relaxing atmosphere, Check! Awesome teas with huge variety, Check! Knowledgeable personnel, that treats tea as it should be treated, Check! Impressive customer service, Check! They could charge a tiny bit less for their teas, but still it's the best tea in Thessaloniki.

title: Don't miss it in Thessaloniki
text: One of the best place to make a breakfast and start in a new day. Good coffee and good food. Keep on going

title: Great place, tasty brunch!
text: The prices are reasonable, the waiters are very polite and friendly, the atmosphere is just cool! I love drinking coffee or having lunch there.

title: For the love of tea
text: Wide range of of teas and very knowledgeable stuff. The service was excellent and the detail of setting a timer on the table set for the exact time for the tea was very thoughtful. They clearly know that serving tea is a process. Each tea is served in the appropriate teapot and tea cups. I didn't even know that there are different types! The pastries were fresh and tasty and the fruit (kiwis) was delicious. Also, I really appreciated the cotton hand towels in the bathroom instead of the paper towels that are everywhere and threatening to bury us in waste. Ecofriendly and homy at the same time. Only drawback is the price. I know tea is expensive and the shop is on one of the most trendy and expensive streets in town, but it still hurt.

title: Suggested
text: We have been here,during our holidays,to try some Greek specialities. Definitely suggested,good quality of food and nice customer service. Just a lack of seats, but quality is high.

title: LOVE
text: Cannot say enough how much my friends and I love this place. The food and coffee is amazing and the fashion is all gorgeous. The owner and staff are also all extremely nice and friendly. We went here 3 times during our stay in Thessaloniki, and everyone went above and beyond to make sure we were taken care of. My only regret is that this place isn’t closer to home!

title: Huge tea selection, great friendly service
text: We had tea and yummy 60% cacao hot choclate here. The service was exceptional and they offered some complimentary homemade cockies as well. Opens late. Will visit again

title: Cozy hideaway from the rain
text: Perfect place for a lunch and/or a snack. The food was tasteful and the staff was super helpful and nice. We even got a free slice of rum cake! We truly recommend this place!

title: Chic place, great pancakes,
text: Chic place, great pancakes, kind waiters, reasonable prices. Great for eggy breakfast or brunch. Loved it ❤️

title: Very good
text: We got sandwiches & salad to go. The chicken salad was amazing & not to be missed. The turkey & prosutto sandwiches were ok. Not much meat or cheese & a little dry. Very friendly staff.

title: Amazing
text: The food is very delicious. The staff is very friendly. If we go Thessaloniki again we sure will come here again

title: Lovely place!
text: Nice atmosphere, friendly staff, great eggs and pancakes! I definitely suggest if you go to Thessalonica.

title: worth visiting
text: One of the nicest tea shops/rooms I know. Very friendly personnel and products of very good quality. I would personally recommend its great refreshments, fresh salads and quiche lorraine.

title: Homemade pitakia at its best
text: Everything tastes so good here. Its made in store and you can feel that in the taste. Spanakopitakia are amazing as well as all of their pitakia. Sweets are pretty good as well. My to go place for pitas in the morning.

title: Will come back to Greece just to visit this store again

Carefully sourced Brazilian and Ethiopia single-origin roasts and a two-bean blend from Costa Rica and Panama have been alloted to cold filter, espresso and milk-based drinks respectively. text: A decent non-commercial store with good sweet pastry and playful combinations. Compared to other sweet pastry stores around it offers you exactly what it's supposed to consistently without fluffy tags of free from...almost everything. 'No sugar' - 'No milk' - 'No pastry' - 'No dough'...More

title: Simple and very good.
text: Great quality coffee, where you can tell the roast has been picked with care and good simple side honest dishes. Friendly staff willing to help you translate.

title: No WiFi
text: I went with a friend to study. We paid for the Coffee and when we connected to the WiFi we reliased that there was no Internet. We contacted the staf of the store and we were told that they could reset the Modem to fix the problem. After 20 min no reset and no Internet and no refund for the coffee of course. Not going there again

title: Inconsistent, Insulting, Terrible behavior
text: We ordered a cake for my young son 4 days before his birthday. Our communication was written via email and everything was supposed to be organized but we were left without cake!!! Their behavior was so bad, insulting and rude they didn’t even apologize for the inconvenience. We found out that we had no cake at the day of his birthday. Pour little guy was so upset and cried so much because he was expecting the cake he chose. I definitely not recommend that shop to anybody!!!!! Completely unprofessional!

title: Cocktail.
text: Top. The best coffee and cocktail bar in town. Retail coffee. New cocktails. Alternative style. Amazing place

title: Suprise stop
text: The view and especially the products are outstanding. Enjoyed a Maui fruit drink and a tuna sandwich that was very good. This is a must visit location at Thessaloniki.

title: A small hidden gem!
text: A great coffee spot downtown with even more delicious cakes and sweets! Try the cheesecake! ;-) Prices are respectable for the place given and more than welcome to serve you staff.

title: Best coffee in Thessaloniki
text: I definitely recommend trying an espresso and a flat white.. The coffee is freshly roasted and the staff is really nice and helpful. It also looks really good

title: Best place to stop by and refresh
text: I drank fredo espresso, frappe, Don Carleone and Rambo - loved them all. The guy was really nice and helpful

title: Not impressed at all.
text: Was walking by sugar angel with my friend & stopped in for a cupcake. Big mistake!! We got a vanilla cupcake with chocolate frosting that was easily a week old. How do we know, you ask? The center of the actual cake was dryer than the desert of the Saharah. I wish I had taken a picture of me dropping it in the closest trashbin right at the end of the street. I should’ve taken my €2.80 and flushed them down the toilet. Would’ve gotten more bang for my buck. AVOID!

title: The 3rd Wave Coffee but could be better
text: This is a good place for coffee or drinks. I tried their cold brew and it was good (not very good though) They also provide roasted beans but when I was there they had some 15 days old roastings so I didn't bought them. A roastery should always had fresh roastings. Still I liked the place

title: Fresh fruit juice
text: Very near the White Tower, this juice bar is a very nice place for a tasty fruit juice, or smoothie. An oasis in the summer heat of Thessaloniki. Wide range of choices, the kids liked it a lot. There is room for improvement in the decoration but without doubt a very good place for a fresh, tasty and healthy drink

title: Very nice and unique, the staff could be more polite and helpful!
text: The sweets are very tasty and nice, some of them are like art! The place is super sweet, white decoration ! Yet, the staff is sometimes rude and not so kind!

title: Nice place to have a drink at night.
text: Greate deephouse mix, good atmosphere, cute barmens. The service is fast. We were there after 10 pm, the coffee bar was closing, but we had a drinks and enjoyed the evening. The music was top, and the volume was just right to hear each other. Very nice people, it was Monday, so the place was not overcrowded.

title: So good juice
text: We were there three times - twice after working out and once for hangover recovery.  The juices are really excellent, the bowls are good too, and so is the coffee. They also play good music, and the staff are very friendly.  We didn't actually visit this particular JOIN (it's a chain), but the one in Ladadika.

title: Gonna love this, if you are a sweets lover!
text: Wonderful coffee place, you can enjoy your favorite fresh cake with coffee, with a great variety, friendly atmosphere and perfect candy decoration!

title: Disappointed
text: My first experience with Blue Cup was quite good. I was excited to try their light roast coffee so I ordered Costa Rica chemex, which they served with sparkling water palate cleanser and biscuits. It was indeed very nice. Encouraged by my first visit I decided to go again on a Sunday. It was very busy I have to say, however for someone who also works in a business and knows the drills I was very disappointed to wait 20minutes to place my order and 30minutes to get my coffees. I ordered americano and V60. First one was delicious but V60? not so much... I can live with little over or under extractions but that coffee was too much. It was like licking a tire. Its bitterness was overwhelming. As far as I know, in Greece when you don't like something you can send it back and get something else you will enjoy instead, however discouraged by almost an hour wait I had to leave it as it was. Shame, because the place itself looks really interesting and the combination of bar and speciality coffee is a recipe for success. I would suggest trying a bit of pour-overs before you serve it.

title: Join Juicy
text: Right on the sea front of Thessaloniki you can enjoy a wide variety of juices. Reasonable prices, nice service and music.

title: nothing exceptional
text: It's a pleasant place to go for dessert, but the coffee quality is lower than the average of the town.

title: Nice atmosphere, excellent music, cozy interior
text: Excellent place to have a drink after dinner in Thessaloniki. The music mix is just perfect. Charming and friendly staff. Bar tender Nicos combines in a perfect way his mechanical engineering education with drink preparation skills. Try his version of Porn Star Martini - with citrus touch, very refreshing. Will give you energy for a long night of fun and dancing.

title: Great juicy spot
text: They have an excellent menu with lots of choices and the juices I tried were amazing. Everythingnis very fresh. Good stuff!

title: Interesting cakes, some unusual tastes
text: Nice sweets and coffee place. Many different cakes with interesting tastes for everyone. Large selection of coffees and teas. Worthwhile visiting.

title: The best coffee shop in Thessaloniki
text: Nice place , clean and comfortable with finest coffee taste. We tried cappuccino and cold brewed coffee (which was served in little bottle and was very tasty). Also guys are friendly, gentle and they know how to make your day better using cup of coffee.

title: Healthy juice and smoothy bar
text: We went three times during our visit to Thessaloniki. The place is clean, modern and serves plenty of healthy juices, sweet and green smoothies, has almond, soy and coconut milk, good coffee and jumpy sandwiches. Free Wi-Fi. Great place!

title: Really nice place!
text: "Sugar Angel" it's a really nice, luminous place to drink coffee or anything else from their list and taste a piece of their cakes! I recommend it for sure if you want a change in the city centre and if you are in the mood of something sweet! Just check it out!

title: Highly recommended for a lazy Sunday afternoon
text: This Coffee Roaster and Cocktail Bar is perfect for a lazy Sunday afternoon. The service is excellent and you might find difficult to decide what to order as the place offers some unique coffees and cocktails! Don't forget to buy coffee accessories and coffee from...More

title: Gr8 healthy morning
text: By chance everything else here opens at 9am and these guys were open at 8:30. great coffee & amazing juices and sandwiches - happy I ran into the place.

title: Sweet Sweet Sweet
text: The sweetest experience we had in the city of Thessaloniki.A small cozy cafeteria with very friendly staff fantastic decor very nice coffee and cakes to die for.A bit expensive but it deserves it.

title: Great overall
text: I like it! Taste of coffee, service and prices. Location isn't great, but everything else is ok. They try to help people learn how to drink coffee the right way and make a great one!

title: Eating healthy snacks
text: Not another greek souvlaki store.It'a place where fast food is healthy and fresh.You can find salads,sandwiches and lots of juices and smoothies.Not expensive just in front of the sea.

title: The most sweetest place in thessaloniki
text: You can taste your favourite sweets, cakes and anything you like. It's a very nice patisserie in downtown that no-one should miss a visit.

title: Excellent
text: A variety of perfect unique cocktails! Nice place at the harbor area with very good service. Good lounge music.

title: Super refreshing
text: Came here after stuffing my face with gyro and ice cream. I wanted something that would help me digest and also refresh me. I had the Don Corleone ehich had apple, pineapple, ginger and spearmint. It was so nice and super tasty. Everything was really fresh and made to order. It definitely helped my stomache feel better and I would recommend this place for any time of the day. They had so many different options and they even serve nice healthy sandwiches.

title: Delicious pastries!!
text: I keep visiting this place whenever I crave for something sweet. Although it is quiet small and most of the times it is not easy to find a table, the atmosphere is great and the pastries are really awesome. My favourite is the cheesecake oreo, which I strongly recommend.

title: Coolness in a cup
text: Just popped in here for a cup of coffee one morning, whilst staying in the hotel over the road....but what a cup of coffee.  Coffee bar one side by day, cocktail bar on the other by night, but all in a very cool interior space, I would love to have gone back at night for the cocktail session.

title: Yummy.
text: Juices from fresh fruits, and many things to choose from. I went for the peanut butter smoothie which was excellent. It is a great refresher and would definitely recommend giving it a try while walking down the promenade.

title: Good patisserie in the city centre
text: This is a very good patisserie in the heart of Thessaloniki. The desserts are very tasty. I had the dark angel profiteroles and it was amazing. I also tried the lemon mousse and I liked it a lot.  There are tables inside and outside to seat. The service was ok.  It is worth a visit.

title: Excellent place to visit for drinks
text: Very nice atmosphere, very good quality of drinks. The guys at the bar were amazing, the music and the cocktails made the difference. Thanks to Nikos who was exceptional as a bartender and look after us all night.

title: Great chill out place and healthy choices
text: Great place to chill that overlooks the waters. Lots of healthy drink and food selection though the focus is mainly on drinks. They have sandwiches and salads for those who need something more. Good wifi too. Nice staff!

title: Best sweets in the city
text: This place literaly has the best sweets in the city of Thessaloniki. Red velvet espacially is above all expectations. A very small and tiny place, very cute and well designed though offers you the best dessert option. it worth a try...

title: Style and essence
text: As a coffee freak i usually get dissapointed by local coffee shops. GO OVER THERE and get a coffee they really really know what they are doing!!!

title: Amazing range of healthy treats to eat
text: We found this fabulous place on the seafront and returned just two nights later. It serves the most delicious salads, sandwiches and juices and there was a good range of vegetarian choices too. It was a wonderful 'find' and we certainly recommend a visit here.

title: cream cheese frosting to a whole other level!
text: Amazing cakes that are by far better to their European counterparts! Quite expensive so cannot afford regular visits there.Would certainly recommend it to locals to taste something different and why not to visitors if they feel homesick and they want to test their cake experience.

title: Third wave love
text: Possibly the first (and only) third wave coffee shop in Thessaloniki. A lovely place, offering all kinds of brews. My only complaint is that occasionally, their coffee isn't that fresh, so check out the rotating dates.

title: What a treat
text: This was downstairs from our family's house and how lucky were we! Just divine inspired juice bar plus great paninis and salads. Fantastic prices, great helpful service, and beautiful interiors plus nice sidewalk seating. No smoking enforced!

title: Definetely worths a visit

title: Amazing Cocktails
text: Lovely venue and delicious cocktails. The staff was very friendly and they will make suggestions and modifications to their drinks to make sure you will like them.

title: Cool drinks !
text: We were sitting outside with my friends. Got amazing juices and smoothies from this place ! We wanted to stay and talk although that was kinda difficult cause there were cars passing by the place and sometimes it was really hard to hear. If we stayed inside I believe it would be better but there was no room at that moment for more than 4 people inside the store. Will totally visit again!

title: Too much hype
text: It is supposed to be one of the good desert places. What I saw was average deserts, unfriendly staff and expensive prices

title: Love it!
text: Great tasting coffee for a fussy coffee lover! Great Flat White and other varieties you might have got used to in Europe that you cannot find everywhere in Thessaloniki. This is a must try when in the center!

title: refreshing
text: Had a large classic juice for only 3€. It tasted fresh and my order came quickly. The place offers seats as well as multiple outlets for your devices. The location is right on the strip along the boardwalk. I didn't get food here though.

title: heaven, made in heaven
text: OMG! OMG! THE best cakes and sweets in general... always so packed but the minute you open the door and the sugar smell inserts your nostrils... you will be able to wait even for an hour to sit! try anything with oreo! i love them all..

title: Light roasted Greek coffee: It Does Exist
text: I read about this place on the internet before my trip & decided to drop by in hope of a decent cup of coffee. The cafe was very spacey & calm on the inside; it also had outdoor seats but those were crowded with smokers. A number of specialty coffees were on display but only one ‘coffee of the day’ was offered in the brew-bar. I ordered that one in a Chemex -- it was an Ethiopia, can't remember its full name -- it felt oddly spicy but definitely was not bad. I also bought a pack of beans of a different sort, the Ethiopian Mocca, and this one proved truly stellar when I brewed it at home. All in all, the place is definitely worth it.

title: excellent

title: One of the best in town -must visit

title: Must drink here!
text: Super place with fresh juices. Beautiful interior, excellent service and a very large selection of juices! Excellent location - the doors overlook the embankment. Always fresh air!

title: The temple of sugar!
text: This place has mostly desserts!It worths tasting at least one time!Variety of cakes, cupcakes and american style desserts!I think there is no proper combination of price and quantity!!However, everything is delicious..Since I am a chocolate lover I tasted many of the chocolate desserts and they are realy great!cheesecake and lemon cake should be also options!

title: Healthy stop after a walk
text: Wide range of juices for any taste, nice music and great for working environment. The elixir juice was awesome!

title: Best Oreo Cheesecake ever.
text: The cakes are super fresh, the portions are more than filling and the atmosphere great. Avoid peak times and you will love it.

title: Juice, smoothies, tea and sandwiches across from the White Tower
text: The Juice Bar that we visited is almost across the street from the White Tower. It reminds me of Jamba Juice in California. There are a wide variety of juices and smoothies as well as lunch items. The juice smoothies are very good.

title: Delicious sweets and good coffee
text: The decoration was fantastic and the view outside calming. The sweets not only delicious and affordable but also wonderfully decorated. Clean place and easily accessible. The only disadvantage was that the staff wasn't as friendly and helpful as it should be.

title: freshness overload
text: They serve the best coffee I have tried in this city. Plus great variety of fresh yogurts, fruit salads and some delicious herbal teas and the staff is quite agreable too

title: Best cakes in town
text: We went there a Saturday noon and we had coffee and two slices of cakes. I took the red velvet cake and my friend took the oreo cake. They were both delicious! The coffee served was very very good! The shop is small but really cute like a fairytale. The staff was very helpful and smiling.

title: Healthy Drinks
text: Nice juice bar, large selection of fruits, smoothies, sandwiches. Cool atmosphere, strict no-smoking. Staff are attentive and friendly.

title: A paradise to enjoy tasteful sweets!
text: this is a paradise that a beautiful lady Mrs Aggheliki has brought to the city. It is in down town and you can have excellent coffe with the most original, inspiring, tasteful tastes for cakes and sweets! Service is excellent and very polite, and also onside is one of the few places non smoking the city. If you prefer to stay out by the pedestrian street you can always have a choice. my best thing for sweets in town!

title: Bad experiance

If they had an all-green vegetable option that was all juiced I would have given them five stars. Still a lot better than most juice bars we come across though, which mostly only offer fruit juices.

title: Nice coffee and cakes

title: Amazing drinks and cozy atmosphere

title: Nice

title: A cup of coffee, a cake and an Angel Thessaloniki downtown.

You should take the Greek coffee, although it looks like a cappuccino fits more to the place. Choose freely one of the house cakes. They are all fresh, handmade and delicious. I suggest the coconut cake or the noisete.

title: Best drinks in town
text: We have visited this great bar 3 times during our stay in Thessaloniki! They have not dissapointed a single time! Very good drinks, great staff and really cozy athmosphere.

title: Cool place!

title: Coffee break

The menu was extensive for juices, sandwiches, salads and more! Our lunch meal was raved about by every person! The quality of ingredients was top notch. Pricing is good and the location was fantastic!

title: Sweet sin
text: A perfect place to willingly throw away your money to irresistible sweet creations! Prices are a bit high, but it worths it!

title: Excellent atmosphere! Good

title: Quality - non smoking - baby friendly

Brussels, Paris, London, Stockholm...).  It's also friendly for babys and breastfeeding. Although there isn't a change diaper designated place, you can use the sofas.

title: Candy crash
text: My favorite place for a dessert ! All the sweets are absolutely delicious ! The atmosphere is great and the cafe smells like a cupcake! The homemade lemonade is reaaally tasty and refreshing and so does the rest refreshments. For the chocolate lovers, "rosso d' amore" is one of the best chocolates I' ve ever drunk! As it is located in a redestrian area, there are a few tables to rest outside in the summer! Highly reccomended !

title: Awesome atmosphere
text: Cool drinks and the location is an Street corner. You can eat something with your drinks. It's very tasty. The people who will visit this location are also cool.

title: Just great.
text: Freshly squeezed fruit and vegetable juices in a wonderful environment. The prices are reasonable and the staff is very helpful and friendly.

title: sweet temptation
text: The sweetest enjoyment of the city with cheesecake,oreocake and lemonpae to be the number one choise with the most delicious espresso.

title: All day cosy cafe/bar
text: Very decent place in the city centre. Have been there a couple of times for a glass of wine just out of nowhere. It's the place to grab your coffee in the morning and go after work for drinks with your friends. Nice, cosy and casual place.

title: Unique of its kind!

title: Busy and atmospheric
text: A great place to have drinks with friends and if you stay out too long a pizza to soak up the gin. Lovely setting and great staff

title: Cheesecake
text: New york cheesecake is absolutely amazing . No smoking. Great and clean place. Fresh air. Smells like sweets. Best coffee in town.

title: Cosy and friendly place
text: nice location, charming decor, friendly personal and quality service View toward the sea from the angle

title: I love that place
text: I it the most beautiful place for coffee and sweet in Thessaloniki! The atmosphere is perfect! The staff is so friendly! You have to try the Carrot cake!! It is just perfect!

title: Professional job
text: I have visited Arc Bar more than once. Brunch, finger food, coffee, cocktail options. This place is really well organized! I loved the a inside architecture, the outside bar, the music and of course all the people that work there. Really nice job guys! Continue like that!

title: Sweeeeeeet....!!!
text: Marvelous decoration, excellent sweets, unfortunately rather limited space, good service and last but not least, one of the few smoke-free cafes in Thessaloniki. We went there a month ago, a large group of friends and although we found difficulties to find a table, the staff helped us and after a delay of 15' we were finally sitting inside. The variety of sweets is large and all of them seem delicious. The ones we ordered at least were indeed delicious (oreo cheesecake, cupcake velvet, angel rose, carrot cake, city forest and more...). We had a really great time. The prices are mostly reasonable. It is definitely recommended to everyone, it is an unforgettable experience!!

title: nice cafe / pub
text: classy well located, nice ambiance with good quality of drinks with trendy music and good hospitality of the team

title: Excellent environment and food decoration but too sweet sweets!
text: I've visited Sugar Angel plenty of times but I was so excited like the first time! So beautifully decorated and that smell of butter inside makes you want to eat everything!the staff is always kind and helpful,even when customers are fighting for a seat! One thing really disappointed me where a few sweets I 've tried that were too sweet for me! Apart from the red velvet cake which is perfect, the lemon pie, the Oreo cake and another one chocolate cake was at least average for me! I had two spoons and couldn't have more!

title: Wonderful times
text: Lovely people and a cozy fun vibe . A great place to spend your morning having brunch or your evening drinking their signature cocktails . A really friendly environment that welcomes you every time of the day . Worth a visit at least

title: sweet like an old movie
text: This is a delicious pastry bakery and cafe. Hidden in a little street, you feel that you are in a 40's movie. Amazing setting, friendly staff but the smells that are coming out of the kitchen are the best. Freshly baked cakes, pastries, cupcakes, tartes, served on their own or with your coffee. Amazing carot cake, nice cheese and ham muffin and so many more. It is a must for your morning coffee or afternoon tea.

title: Best coffee and pizza in town!
text: A great coffee place in the center of Thessaloniki with tasty coffee and a super-delicious pizza 🍕!! They are very professional and friendly, as well. Highly recommended.

title: great for dancing nights
text: one of my favorites bars for money years. great drinks and cockteils, atmosphere and people. love it!!!

title: Let's take a break for a coffee and cake
text: When I am craving for coffee and cake, this is where I go. Always fresh cakes in a pleasant atmosphere.

title: super
text: the food is delicious and the coctails even more, location super,the stuff always with a smile. will go again 4 sure!

title: Good choice
text: Went there with friends , place was full but still we managed to find a place . Decoration was really cosy . Drinks came quite fast , music was at the right levels . Generally liked it a lot and will definitely go again

title: Beautiful Thessaloniki
text: I've been in this delicious pastry shop two weeks ago .... the delicious "red velvet" and the macarons were super yummy. I'll be back again ..... and you have to go there immediately!!

title: Good for teenagers
text: A place that is not catering to the 30+ folks. Loud, staff that is flat faced and dont present with willigness to help patrons with finding a good drink. At 9.05 pm most people were having coffee at this bar. Not a coinsidence. However, looks good. If you dont smoke run!!! You will do second, third, and 10th hand smoking inside and outside. Gas chamber. I tried it 4 times. Time for something else.

title: Great breakfast platter
text: Went there in the morning,weekday so it was very quiet. Had the breakfast platter for one with my boyfriend. It was delicious and enough for the both of us to feel full.

title: Cool place, great cocktails!
text: A very nice place to have a drink at night. The staff was very friendly. i liked their list of own cocktails. I just loved one of them, but couldn't remember the name, it was with black himalayan salt and tobasco. Sure will revisit to...More

title: Very pleasant atmosphere
text: Beautiful place, friendly staff, good selection of wines, generous portions cheese and cured meat to accompany your drink.

title: A nice coffee time
text: I came with my girlfriend at a Saturday Morning. The place is cozy, friendly, and has a nice vibe. The staff is really friendly and polite, willing to help you. The decoration is really beautiful, giving a nice touch to the whole experience. All in all, I would definitely recommend it for a cozy, casual coffee time.

title: One word Fantastic!
text: This bar saved our night, having had a bad experience in a nearby restaurant, it was the 'pick me up' my 15 friends and I were looking for. Maria, our waitress was amazing! All smiles and very attentive, even had a dance with us. Great atmosphere. Had complimentary fruit slices and nuts to go with our drinks. Bloomin fantastic! Thank you so much!

title: **LOVED IT, FROM AMERICA **
text: Uber-hip in the center of the whole town. Even if it isn't the center, it sure feels like it! Great people watching. Drinks slightly under-poured and overpriced. But who cares. The staff is super cool, kind, unpretentious. Diverse clientele. Super cosmopolitan Thessaloniki vibe!! Xo

title: Nice place at a historical area
text: A great area (Ladadika) to walk around and feel the history of the city.. Paraty a nice place with beautiful decoration where you can enjoy a drink.. Highly recommended

title: Rocking
text: Perfect bar in the center, super drinks with friendly staff & super packed on a weekday.. hard to find a table outside. Enjoyed !!

title: Pleasant Place for a pre-dinner tipple!
text: Enjoyed a couple of draught beers sat outside at this very pleasant location prior to eating elsewhere. it is opposite what appears to be a nightclub so it could possibly be quite noisy later into the evening. Good prompt service

title: Nice bar in the center
text: ARC is a nice bar located in the center. The staff is nice, the terrace is fine. The beers come with some snacks, so everything is good.

title: Great Place for a drink.
text: Fun, diverse,, great music and drinks. Located in the Ladadika area of Thessaloniki, always hopping with a nice crowd. 3 levels of different styles. My favourite is the loft, the corner near the window makes you feel like you are having a drink in your home.

title: Good cappuccino
text: We got the last two seats in this crowded popular place. Our cappuccinos were strong and frothy. Service was a bit slow, but staff was stretched because of the crowds.

title: Special and cosy bar / café
text: A lovely place in an old building with nice music. Perfect for enjoying a couple of drinks - day & night, really cosy. Nice service

title: Authentic Greek drinks in a modern bar
text: Thanks to Dimitri, who is a very friendly bar tender, we enjoyed a special Greek cocktail with Mastiha liquor. ARC seems to be a very popular place were local people mix with tourists. Besides the special cocktail the bar is well sorted in terms of drinks/cocktails and also serves nice snacks.

title: Nice atmosphere, mediocre cocktails
text: Nice place, good music but stick to beer because the cocktails are pretty much juice or soft drinks with a hint of alcohol

title: Great place! Have lunch here
text: Great location and a hip bar where you can have lunch or dinner with a good glass of wine or cocktail. Perfect bar to visit when you are in Thessaloniki

title: A particular place...
text: A special, cozy cafe in an old building, that combines the leisure with art. That’s because of the masterpieces which are in every corner of the cafe. The absolute choice for a Christmas drink or coffee!!!

title: Nice and busy place for coffee
text: This is a mice and busy place for coffee and drinks.  The service is nice.  I ordered the cold chocolate drink with strawberry flavour. There was no strawberry flavour at all, but the chocolate drink was very tasty. So I did not mind the lack of the strawberry flavour.

title: Cute and cozy
text: I have visited this place multiple times because of the nice atmosphere and the drinks. The decoration is amazing and the stuff helpful. It can get a little hot especially at the second floor when it's full of people. I love this place and prefer to go at times when it is relatively empty. The seasonal decorations are a must to see.

title: Normal place close to Aristotelous
text: The place itself is not something extraordinary, normal bar. Located close to Aristotelous square. The girl who served us was super friendly though!

title: I love their coffee
text: Very sweet staircase and wonderful environment. Great quality coffee and cool staff. I would definitely go again!

title: Great place for a drink
text: We came here for a drink every night since it was close to our hotel and it was great! Only complaint was the apparole spritz was very strong but all the other cocktails we had were amazing. The waiters are also very friendly and even told us to move inside from the heat because it wasn't normal for Thessaloniki to be that hot... thank you kind sir! The inside was amazingly decorated and at the perfect temperature!

title: The Spanakopita of Your Dreams!
text: I've gone back a few times because I fell in love with their triangle-shaped spinach, herb, and feta pie. So incredibly delicious and a MUST when visiting Greece. A great place to stop by for a coffee and a morning pastry or a snack.

title: #greeceisalwaysagreatidea
text: Located very centrally. Wonderful atmosphere and music. Live and young crowd. They also have a great cocktail selection.

title: Fitgirls on the road
text: Two amazing salads with one slight mistake. We ordered the salmon and the ARC salad. The ARC is a recommendation to all who come and eat at ARC. The salmon was chosen because it included avocado according to the menu, but no avocado was found. When we asked he said it was in the sauce, it was a honey-mustard dressing and no avocado was tasted in the salad.

title: Greate

text: Very nice atmosphere for coffee or drinks. Beautiful decoration, nice music and friendly staff. Recommended

title: nice place for a beer not for a coffee though
text: went to this place with hubby enjoyed a nice greek atmosphere nice beer snack and a cup of cold coffee (was so so).

title: Great cappuccino
text: At Aristotle square , this shop is offering coffee, snacks, sandwiches etc. My cappuccino was very good, sandwich with chicken also very tasty. Worth visit.

title: One of the best bars
text: One of the best bars in Thessaloniki. It's really big (3 floors) and beautiful. Great selection of wines and an impressive cocktail list.

title: Best Coffee-Bar in town
text: Walking across Mitropoleos street this cafe will immediately fall into your consideration. Excellent design,nice layout and beautiful decoration. Walking in the store, the staff is welcoming you warm hearted and the guy at the door will propose you a table/position to sit at, which best fits you and your company (as opposed to number of people etc.), leaving you the option to choose whether you like it or if you want to sit somewhere else. The staff which is very polite and hospitable,will recommend beverages including a long list of wines and signature cocktails, as well as very delicious and fine chasers like salads,bruschettes and pizza to combine with you drink ( try the ARC pizza, brown ocean bruschettes and salmon bruschettes they are amazing ). A place for any occasion either business meeting, going out with friends or with your loved one. Nice music, nice people and reasonable prices. Just perfect!!!

title: review
text: the best central coffee-breakfast shop in the town!everything is fresh and delicious!100% value for money!

title: Must go - when it's about to have a drink in thessa
text: Impressive unique bar on 3 floors. With great music and stylish interior. Don't ask for ouzo they have none.

title: Excellent bar choice
text: Funky setting, inviting atmosphere, fun and excellent customer service. Would highly recommend the signature cocktails, especially the 'Monica'. Basically, an excellent option for a good night out with friends or as a couple.

title: Delicious food!
text: Whenever you’re hungry, this corner is always open and you will find whatever you want to eat! Very friendly prices, friendly staff!

title: A good variety of Greek wines
text: A very spacious wine bar situated in a three storey preserved building. The staff was friendly and knowledgeable. The menu consists of wines from every corner of the country so it's great if you want to get a taste of greek wine.

title: Good for breakfast
text: We had our daily breakfast from this shop . The food / coffee / muffins all were very good and fresh .

title: Cocktail in the best meeting point in town
text: A very special environment with friendly people..surprisingly tasteful drinks and cocktails. A place that you should visit again and again..for a meeting..for a coffee..for a drink..

title: Super cool place
text: The decor was absolutely lovely as were the staff. Music was excellent. A place not to be missed. Everyone was kind and attentive. With a bottle of wine came a delicious cheese patter for free.

title: Pastries, Sandwiches and Cheese and Spinach Pies!
text: We stopped in this shop one afternoon to buy cheese and spinach pies for a snack. Delicious!!!!!! Highly recommended! The shop also has many pastries and sandwiches but the little pies were to die for!

title: Wouldn't return
text: Nothing in the place would make me go back, but I would if I Had to. Bad quality of water, the coffee was not something special, overpriced for the quality, the staff was not polite enough

title: Charging
text: I would like to say that I gave my shel phone to a service dude for charging and that cost me one euro

title: Great and tasty pastries.
text: Great and tasty pastries at the center of the city. Big selection of pastries to pick and a good coffee.

title: Excellent
text: The best place in the center and the most friendly stuff!!! I'll definitely visit it again!!! Total recommended!!!

title: 3 bites cheesecake!
text: I paid 2€ for a piece of cheesecake that it was no more that 3 bites! I could not believe it. I felt like they were mocking me!

title: Excellent!!!
text: Located in City center near to all hotels located at center. All shopping streets are 3 minutes walking. Also many restaurants and bar cafes are opposit. Service is excellent and prices are very good. Very nice at night time for couple of drinks and for snacks.

title: taste of thessaloniki
text: lots of sandwich options and several choices from gluten free products perfect fredo esspresso coffe from illy

title: Amazing!!!
text: You must stop here! After a lovely day on the eat and walk tour! _ do that too it's a must, and two coats from Zara we stopped at ARC! Wow the frappe coffee came with Chrisps, nuts and heart shaped shortbread. Paul our waiter was lovely this is him in our photo. Presentation fab! & cool place with great music Stephen says beer is good & cold but would only give 4/5 why????? Because it's too near Zara!! Try it it's lovely

title: Very refined, very well placed. A great spot
text: My best breakfasts during my stay in Thessaloniki. The different coffees are very good, sandwiches, wraps, cakes and other delicatessen are very good and beautifully served The tables on the outside with this magical view complete the description

title: Nice place for coffee next to everything
text: one street from the seaside is a good place for coffee break with polite staff good drinks and big variety of wines and snacks

title: Busy, good and expensive
text: High quality snacks and high prices, very busy most times of the day, average coffee. Personal favourite is the whole grain koulouri.

title: Best wine and cafè bar in town
text: Beautiful and very friendly staff.. The coffee is great and the cocktails list also!! Try Pirgakis rose grapes wine is awesome!!!

title: Perfect for breakfast
text: They offer a variety of bread with multiple filling, super tender and delicious. Outside seating with a iced coffee is all you need for a sunny Greek morning.

title: Best Service
text: The iced coffee was great. Very professional and heartwarming service. The senior waiter by the name Pavlos made our short visit very pleasant!

title: Hands down the best bakery in Thessaloniki
text: Phenomenal bakery. We stayed nearby and ended up grabbing breakfast pastries, fresh squeezed orange juice, and coffee there everyday. Also many great lunch options. Vegan choices as well. Very accommodating staff and excellent service.

title: Beautiful cafe
text: A yummy eatery with outside chairs to enjoy your food. It’s well run. From ice creams to tyropites to sandwiches.

title: Just what you need at any time
text: Perfect place to go and chill with your friends and have a good time. Just a look away you can see the sea and forget about all your problems. Holiday mood on at any time. The staff is excellent trained and the service is really good. Must visit if in Thessaloniki!

title: I LOVE THIS BAKERY
text: I love this place everyone and everything was excellent. All the pastry and sandwiches were so fresh and healthy. All the staff are so kind and generous. I recommend everyone to visit this excellent bakery in Thessaloniki. One of the best places I've been in the last years. Keep it up Albeta and hope to see you soon. Can't wait to eat my favorite Cheesecake and drink my favourite coffee. Thank you

title: Acceptable...!
text: Located in the middle of Aristotelous street. They served sweets and sandwiches. The fresh orange juice and the fresh fruit salad was ok. Normal.

title: Every day worth a visit
text: Great coffee, super nice staff and great vibe. Food is really nice too. Definitely worth a trip for the Freddo Cappuccino plus if you're hungry the Pizzas very tasty.

title: Very good place
text: Very good place. I went it here 2 times in 4 days for dessert They had very good orange cake. It was very very delicious. If you go there.,i recommend eat orange cake. Staff was very kindly.

title: Fantastic
text: Drinks and cocktails in a wonderful atmosphere ! The music is great ! Delicious snacks ! The place to be in Thessaloniki 👌

title: Good selection of pastries
text: Nice coffee and pastries as well as sweets. I think their best snack is pizza. Excellent dough individually made.

title: A nice surprise
text: Very nice looking, good food (sandwiches and pastries), amiable service and relatively cheap. Worth a visit

title: The top level coffe-wine bar in the downtown Thessaloniki
text: I loved the coctails, fresh salads and delicious pasta,friendly service, and the unique environment, Absolutely recomended !!!!

title: Best breakfast experience
text: In a few words: THE best breakfast sandwich in town. And I do not imply a BLT or anything like that. Salmon, tuna, chicken are to be expected; but truffle? Walnut?? Tomato marmalade??? Honey???? Try it once and be hooked for life. Oh, the coffee's good too.

title: Great little find
text: We were in a hurry to pick up a quick snack and some coffee on our way out of the city and found this place as we were walking by. My boyfriend got a lovely iced coffee and a few pastries which were delicious - they had a really cool range of pastries and cakes on offer. great!

title: Just Perfect
text: My daily choice for my morning coffee!!! Beautiful place and lovely people always ready to serve me! Also perfect for a beer or a coctail after work !

title: 24 hours open with large variety
text: Big variety of local pastries, mpougatsa and sandwiches, fresh baked and coffee available 24 hours in the main square.

title: A truly unique bakery with friendly staff
text: Brilliant bakery, with tasty pastries that I can't have enough of. My place of choice for quality coffee. Super-friendly staff that were calling me by name from my first week as a customer. Can't recommend this place enough!

title: Amazing fun
text: We visit last night arc bar in thecentre of thessaloniki. All were beautiful. The stuff was amazing , the music great , the dishes like small burgers and nioki delicious . Next time definitely we will visit again arc

title: Tasty Bougatsa
text: We went for a brunch. The omelette was fine. Our waiter was warm and friendly. He recommended us to try Thessaloniki's traditional dessert Bougatsa. It really was tasty.

title: A great place for a light breakfast , lunch or dinner
text: They serve a very nice small salad or a cup of fruit. They have nice sendwiches and nice cakes with a very good cuppuochino We went there several times during our vacation and it was always very nice. Yona S.

title: Hottest spot in town
text: Great atmosphere Great service Great coffee And a variety of really nice cocktails I enjoyed every visit of mine the past two years!

title: Coffee, pastries and more.
text: As it is named after, "traditional ", it is a nice place for coffee break, or take away sandwiches and pastries. I always visit the branch, located northbound to "Panorama area ".

title: No1
text: The very best breakfast in Thessaloniki.Nothing to compare with.You can taste the stunning greek food in a pleasant place.Excellent choice for everyone as you can find huge variety in the best quality.Highly recommended. Enjoy it!

title: Sandwich for the train
text: Paradosiako is a 24 hour bakery that is on the corner of Aristotelous Square and Tsimiski Street, which fortunately was near our hotel. It was the perfect place early in the morning to grab a snack for the long train ride back to Athens.

title: The best choice
text: Beautiful place to be,kind staff and wide variety of wines...Tasty food in affordable prices... Simply the best choice!!!

title: Very nice!
text: Definitely visit it again! Value for money!Quality drinks and snacks ,very polite staff! Really know how to treat you!

title: frapè and bougatsa on the main square
text: on the main square paradosiako is perfect place to enjoy a very slow frapè while having a bite of bougatsa to fill the stomach. fresh, clean, tasty.

title: Excellent
text: Nice place with very friendly and kind staff! The best choice for every hour of a day! Great menu and remarkable cocktail list! Totally recommended

title: Nice
text: Delicious fresh sandwiches and pastry, very good espresso, all self-service. Nice location, cost atmosphere and good light.

title: Nice cafe
text: Good choice for coffee, pastries and baked goods. Fresh products. Place gets very busy on weekends and around lunch time and seating is limited so unfortunately people often comsume their beverages etc while standing.

title: The right place
text: Great service.Amazing and friendly staff,especially sevi with that bright and beutiful smile!keep it high!

title: Fantastic small bakery
text: Perfect for a breakfast with delicious sweets as well as small hot pieces. Coffee is extremely good to wake up, ideally to enjoy with fresh squeezed orange juice. Nice atmosphere in the morning ...  Located directly in Thessaloniki's city centre, close to all hot spots of the town.

title: Quick snack
text: The food quality and variety seems good. The prices are high. The location is the best right at the corner of Aristotelous square and Tsimiski street. I really don't like that every cold sandwich has some sauce in it (mustard, honey, mayo etc ).

title: Magnificent choice
text: The most tasteful cocktails in the city and variety of wines for every taste..you should try coctail mandarine sour👍🏻..staff was very kind and the music was unique..

title: Cozy place
text: Good for coffee, pastries and breakfast. Accessible cafe and comfortable to sit down with your friends and discuss.

title: Very good
text: My choice was a cheese-pie (tiropita). It was very tasty and I could see that it resembled a lot the traditional pies the Greeks make at their homes. The place is excellent and always full with people. The only thing I did not enjoy was the price, which could have been lower. But given the taste and the place of the store, I believe this is not a major issue.

title: Excellent
text: Because of my job I travel all over the Europe..Its the first time that I find a bar that combines quality and service! The staff is very polite and willing to serve you ,there is a big variety of wines and the cocktails are simply amazing! There are also many finger food choices that fulfill all the needs ...Visit this significant corner of the town!

title: Love this place! A must in Thessaloniki
text: One of the coziest places in Thessaloniki! Coffee and dessert lovers should definitely visit this bakery! Also the best place for a delicious breakfast !

title: great/сјајно
