title: Don't forget !!!
text: One of the best corners in town . The staff is incredibly polite, the environment is very nice and you can find everything about food, cocktails and especially wines.

title: It could have been better
text: I tried salmon sandwich. Sandwich itself was big, the ingredients and the taste was good but could have been much more inside.

title: Very nice place
text: We had some salad and coffee! Very lovely food and Drinks, little sweets with the coffee. Absolutely friendly servant.

title: Nice place and music
text: Very nice bar, great people, mood and music. Very close to the center and all hotels. People going around, not much of a view but we liked a lot.

title: Smell of freshly baked
text: Really I was just passing outside when I saw this good looking sandwiches and I became suddenly hungry! The man explained what is in the baked covered by bread. I took for Take Away that one with filadelphia&turkey and the other feta, tomato,olives and oregano (1,20€ each). Both were Delicious and totally fresh! Amazing tasty dough. Worth a try!

title: VERY NICE PLACE TO EAT OR JUST HAVE COFFEE
text: We visit Paradosiako every time we come to Thessaloniki. Its a must. Because our hotel is always near Aristotelous, we always find time to grab something to eat and usually is a piece of mbougatsa. We have tried from other places also, but I thing this one is one of the best. There is a big variety of sweets, sandwiches and lots of other things. Is cheap, although is in the middle of Aristotelous. Coffee is very nice also. You can have take away or if you find a table outside is very nice to sit and enjoy the view to the sea.

title: Good
text: this is a very nice place in Salonicco. It's near the sea and at the middle of a little place full of other bar or restaurant. You can have a drink or a good and big sandwich. I like it

title: Great Frappe and Pastries
text: Friendly staff in a quieter location. You can buy frappes just about anywhere but some are more enjoyable than others. The frappes here are amongst the best we have had in Thessaloniki. There is also a great range of pastries to choose from.

title: Very nice
text: Good food . good desert bed caffe beautiful place in the center of Thessaloniki easy to find Nice view

title: Amazing
text: Been here most of the time I was in Thessaloniki. Service was amazing,I have to say about our waiter,I think his name was Vasilis,he was attentive and perfect in every aspect,can't thank him enough.We left him a napkin with our msgs of thanks in the end of the night,thats how impressed we were!Place is relaxed with a nice vibe,drinks are not overpriced.Highly recommended for a night out.

title: Great bakery and coffee shop.
text: This place is one block down from where my wife and I stayed. Totally awesome as it is off the main drag and offers a nice experience in this neighborhood. Very nice staff and good food.

title: Greek traditional breakfast
text: Remains one of the best places to buy mpougatsa in the city. Really tasty pastries. A pleasant surprise was their chocolate ones!

title: It is not a restaurant!!!!!
text: Great place to have coffee, cocktails or a glass of wine! Used to go there often. Music is very good. Prices are reasonable.

title: Bad
text: I just had breakfast there with my boyfriend and we found WORMS in our orange juice. We are both sick now. Clearly they buy cheap oranges, which aren't even fresh. They've obviously had them in storage for way longer than their expiration date. The staff wasn't helpful at all when we reported the incident. Overall, we do not recommend.

title: Place to relax after sun!
text: Very good place for drinks and after sun relaxing moments. Everybody is friendly and very attentive to serve, we've been very happy with Patrizia taking care of everything! Thank you all!

title: Everybody loves it but I hate it
text: you wait in line for a long time to be served, it has great variety but lacks in flavor in my opinion

title: Very nice breakfast
text: We stopped for a quick breakfast. There are many options to choose as salty and sweety dishes. Everything we ordered were delicious. The prices are so cheap as well. We paid 10,9 euros for 2 turkey & cheese sandwiches, 2 sweety croissants, 2 americanos and a water. You can also take away your orders.

title: Always fashion crowded!
text: casual chic crowd all day, for coffee, wine, spirits and more!! You can find some interesting choices of food as well!

title: amazing food
text: great place to indulge with some of the best pastries I have tasted. Ideal to snack, for a quick bite or take home to share.

title: Great Bistro Bakery
text: A very nice bakery with a great atmosphere. The boyoz (something like bougatsa) was very good and the homemade bougatsa one of the best in the city. All other pastries and bakery products fresh and very tasty. Only downside was the omelet, that was not anything special.

title: Great cozy cafe
text: Loved everything about it, coffees pastries. Staff is amazing and very polite. The place was very beautifully decorated. Prices are very low and very economical.

title: Lovely atmosphere
text: Surprisingly nice place, lovely atmosphere and ambiance, amiable staff and nice music. Internet is fast and the furniture is comfy, ideal for work or a coffee. Plenty of desserts that look delicious but I did not try any.

title: Great coffee!
text: If you would like to enjoy a really great ice coffee, do not miss this place. overcroweded outside...

title: A place for dessert lovers!!
text: Cozy atmosphere, excellent service and mouth watering desserts make this place unique and one of the best places in Thessaloniki to enjoy your coffee! The staff is very friendly and professional! Keep up the great work!

title: Perfect spot for cocktails
text: I really like this place to go on a Friday or Saturday Night. The Staff is very friendly and the cocktails are really good. Also the food is very tasty. It also has a nice view of the street where it’s located. 😊

title: Fresh cakes and more!
text: Splendid freshbaked cakes! Cosy atmosphere and great people! One of the best cake shops in Thessaloniki! Close to ring-road and easily reached by car as there is a free public parking space- around 20m on foot by the shop!

title: High end bar, nice atmosphere but expensive
text: Nicely situated in a beautiful street, small terrace and modern hip atmosphere. The cocktails were of their own design and quite good although very sweet. We had a Greek rose, which was good but not very special. The bruchetta of smoked salmon was delicious. Not an extensive menu but had some typical bar food with a twist. It is expensive though. The waiters were uninterested but too unfriendly. They know very little of the menu..

title: Really good cakes!
text: Lovely place. We have visited several times and it was always good and fresh. Nice place to have a coffee too and good to pick up a cake to take home. 5 stars because the cakes and pies are excellent. Highly recommended!

title: warm ambiance with nice staff
text: Small but very nice bar in general especially signature cocktails and wine selection are great.. i’d drop by whenever i go thessaloniki again..

title: A must go !!!!
text: This place is a gem! It is so unique and exceptional! The carrot cake is the best I have ever tried, whilst the new your cheese cake is simply perfect. The flavors are balanced so well, the servings are perfect and the freshness of the deserts is amazing. Try the macarons, they are full of flavor and as chewy as the best you can ever eat. The people that run the place are true connoisseurs of the art, using the best ingredients available. Support their effort, they truly deserve it. And...they make superior Hellenic coffee....

title: Nice bar
text: Visit with family and had a great time. Accessible and very helpful service. I would definitely go again because the crowd there is so cool.

title: Super Cool and Super Friendly
text: Awesome mid-sized wine and espresso bar on a busy little street just off the promenade. Popped in for a quick afternoon coffee which turned into several evening glasses of wine upon the welcome suggestions from the helpful staff. Good people, good drinks, thoughtful little snacks, and overall a high quality experience. Will return.

title: Nice atmosphere good selection
text: After going to a number of bars looking for quality rum ( not low quality bacardi or havana) we found this place which had diplomatico reserve ( not the best but better). The service is efficient and attentive and I recommend it for special needs.

title: Super place!!! Very tasty!!
text: Super place!!! Very tasty!! Perfect for breakfast!! Nice people are working here!!!! Thank you a lot !!!!❤️❤️❤️

title: Good coffee in the centre of Thessaloniki
text: A small quiet cafe in the centre of Thessaloniki..located in an alley-road vertical on Tsimiski avenue..good quality coffee on a not so noisy place..prices normal..

title: Would definitely recommend
text: Pros - huge variety of healthy drinks and sandwiches - friendly and helpful staff - wifi + places where you can work(just like in Starbucks shops) - great price to quality ratio - close to the city center Cons - honestly none

title: Fresh juice near seafront
text: Friendly, fast-working and english-speaking stuff. Normal prices, big variety of drinks. Gluten-free sweet buttery circly thing, tastes good. Recommend!

title: Best spot in Thessaloniki for healthy meals and juice!
text: We walked around in Thessaloniki on one of the hottest days in the summer. We wanted some healthy and fresh juice. This is the place! With views of the water and a fresh juice in hand we didn’t feel the summer heat. It’s clean and the service is fast! Friendly place to enjoy on a hot summer day!

title: Great food
text: Great place for breakfast or brunch. Healthy food made with fresh ingredients. The sandwiches are lovely. Coffee tastes amazing, too.

title: Nice stop for a healthy and quick food
text: Join Juice Bar has several restaurants in the town. I like their casual vibe, with fresh veggies all over the place and friendly staff :) a lot of interesting food choices and some nice facts to read about the nutritional effect of them. I think it's a healthier alternative to other cafés. Definitely vegans/vegetarians will have plenty to choose from.

title: Great Place with great food
text: The Juice bar is a great place located directly at the harbour promenade of Thessaloniki. You can get good juices, smoothies, salads, sandwiches or bowls for a fair price. Ideal for having breakfast or a snack during the day. We went there this morning and will definitely come back while we‘re in Thessaloníki.

title: Beautiful Place & Lovely Service
text: I love the Ernest because they have comfortable place to enjoy your coffee outsite. The service are professional. Also I love the Party that they made.

title: Fresh juice by the water
text: We like to stop by Join Juice every time we are in Thessaloniki. Many university students study here. During the summer, the drinks are refreshing and very affordable to other European cities’ fresh juice prices. I love the Don Corleone - pineapple, apple, ginger, & spearmint

title: Excellent Saturday Nights
text: This cafe-bar is a must. Great music, great service, and a great place. Perfect for a Saturday late-night drink, which you can combine with tasty finger-food. You can also enjoy the beautiful sea view on a sunny Sunday evening alongside a great coffee. The staff, both waiters and managers, are especially friendly and helpful!  Tip: It regularly hosts great parties that you would not want to miss. I would recomment asking a friend or someone is well-informed to keep you posted on this.

title: Nice juice place by the sea
text: A group of us stumbled upon this juice bar as we walked by the sea of Thessaloniki. For the location (right next to the water), the prices are cheaper than the neighborhood cafes. The juices are tasty (a bit on the sweeter side) and the wifi worked decent. Good ambiance and good music. And the bonus is that no smoking is allowed inside so it was a nice departure from the other cafes that allow smoking indoors. We would definitely come back here to hang out again.

title: Great coffee but loud music
text: We sat inside because there was a chill outside. The coffee we ordered was very well prepared and served. The only drawback was the loud music. We asked the host to turn it down a little but they didn't which was annoying since we were only three tables with people inside and everyone else was outside.

title: Delicious food and coffee
text: The best bakery, Cosy atmosphere, Warm staff. Delicious ice-cream, fantastic sandwich and nice coffee.

title: Excellent cafe bar
text: I have visited it recently with my friends! A great place to enjoy your coffee or your drink. Magnificent view, central location, friendly stuff, excellent service, nice cocktails, large range of wines, spirits and beers.Highly recommended

title: Best bakery in Thessaloniki
text: Best bakery in Thessaloniki and that means a lot. Lots of workers, everything is prepared fresh upstairs. The long work hours are absolutely amazing as I love eating bakery goods all day/night. I'm so glad I found it

title: A night with Greek music!
text: Along with the breathtaking seaview and the friendliest hosting, came the live Greek music and made our outing really unforgettable! Reasonable prices, the best of service, let alone the exquisite cocktails!

title: Open early for great breakfasts
text: Albeta Bakery is one of the few restaurants open at 6:30am for breakfast. As I stepped into the bakery my eyes were greeted by display cases full of scrumptious baked goods. The bakery also offered a limited menu of sandwiches, salads and other items. I had a toasted pastry with an egg and slices of meat (somewhat like an egg McMuffin without the top). I enjoyed a croissant (flakey, warm from the oven) with my coffee (hot, freshly brewed). The staff was friendly and efficient. Prices were a bit higher than other restaurants in the area, but the superb quality and early hours were worth it.

title: Best place
text: Best place , polite waiters and waitresses, quality and excellent live Greek music ! Nice cocktails and so kind hostess .

title: Super for coffee, sandwiches, bread
text: In the district of Ladadika this place has very tasty sandwiches, breads, the coffee is also top quality. Recommended.

title: New Year
text: The best crew ever. You won't regret if you decide to sit here and prices are okay. We had the best New Year's Ewe eveeeer and we will come back here gladly.

title: Great place for breakfast or coffee
text: We were really pleased to find this place. Great coffee, a good selection of bread, sandwiches and cakes, and affordable. I tend to stay inside and avoid the smoke on the terrace. There’s plenty of space with comfortable chairs. Clean and welcoming.

title: I spent the New Year 2020
text: I spent the New Year 2020 in Thessaloniki in a coffee bar by the sea named Ernest. It was unforgettable. The music was fantastic The drinks was great. The prices are also very good. The employees are very kind!

title: Cute, affordable, delicious!
text: Amazing bakery and coffee place recommended 100% to anyone visiting Thessaloniki! Staff are friendly and atmosphere is chill.

title: YOU SHOULD DEFINITELY GO
text: It's such a nice place to have a drink and the staff is so polite and welcoming. I would definitely recommend it.

title: Coffee Spot
text: Best coffee spot at the sea side - to look at the ships and have any kind of coffee. Perfect service. Every time we have a coffee there.

title: Great pie
text: Location is very close to the central area. Cozy setting, tasty pie (cheese pie) pizza is good. Overall is worth to try the place.

title: Best place to have brunch in Thessaloniki
text: I went to Bespoke with family to have brunch and the experience was amazing. Quick and friendly service. The food was very well cooked and the test was just as good. I highly suggest to get the pancakes along with a cold chocolate.

title: Lovely place to catch the view and drinks
text: Cute little place. Not as pretentious as the rest of Nikis. We had beers and coffee all presented well and came with bowls of cookies, a lovely salad, breadsticks and dipping sauce.

title: Nice place for cake, Sandwich and coffee
text: Alot of selection, very good coffee, warm wellcome, many tables inside and outside but still feeling of privacy and very .clean

title: Great meal and service
text: Went there to watch the sunset. It is at a great location on a street along the water. We ordered a couple of glasses of wine, coffee and some desserts. Every time they brought one of the items we ordered they brought a different small side snack. Owner was very friendly and was of great help in selecting the wine. A great place to people and watch and watch the sunset.

title: Great Venue.....Great Sea Views!
text: When you go away for a few days its nice to find a bolt hole worthy of visiting more than once. We found it here at Ernest Hebrard. The staff were both friendly and made us feel very welcome. The chill-out music was superb. They offered a selection of drinks and cocktails all at reasonable prices and also it was one of the very few bars that offered pints of beer( 0.5 litre) most bars preferring to sell by the 330ml bottle which can work out very expensive. Again the staff here made us feel very welcome and it was a great place to chill and unwind. Would recommend a visit!

title: Great place for early breakfast
text: Large choice of croissants and sandwiches are plus a very good coffee (ask to make it strong). Staff very friendly.

title: A great place
text: Bespoke is a wonderful café with an amazing view. The quality of the coffee and and the food they serve is really high. The stuff is always helpful and polite. It's one of my favourite places in the city!

title: A beautiful place for coffee.
text: It was wonderful. The atmosphere was extremly friendly as was the personnel. A great variety of coffee, drinks and tasty dishes. The view is unique.

title: Greek version of “Paul”
text: Stopped by to grab some breakfast to go. Excellent products, honest food! Especially “peynirli” or “peinirli” with different flavors... highly recommended - next time hopefully I will try their sandwiches - they look amazing!

title: A must place!!!
text: Wonderful place, I loved the view and my coffee ☕️. The staff was very friendly!! I totally recommend it!!

title: Coffee and cake
text: Lovely cafe, good feel and delicious treats. Tucked back from the sea front with steady stream of customers. Worth a visit.

title: Amazing coffee spot!
text: Very cozy, with great view of the port and very friendly stuff! Excellent quality of coffee and very tasteful dishes for brunch!

title: whether you are a tourist or local i highly recommend it
text: it is one of the few remaining ( in my humble opinion ) cafes where being a frequent visitor is not frowned upon. if you live in thessaloniki, it is very conveniently located for your coffee or snack. if you are a tourist again you will easily find it and can have a short break before you continue exploring. what makes it ideal is the people who work here. always kind and smiling, they welcome you, make you feel at home. especially giannis is a true professional. with a kind word for everyone and a smiling service, he is very likely to remember your preference if you have visited before. the coffee is great and relatively economical and the treats are delicious and on the healthy side.

title: Great place!! One you must visit!
text: Great coffee, friendly stuff and a delicious brunch! The view is beautiful! One small coffehouse, cozy and warm!

title: Unique flavors
text: Very tasty products, there is a food selection for all day, as you can find savoury and sweet options for breakfast but also lunch and dinner. I prefer it every day for my coffee,exceptional Coffee flavor.

title: Delicious food, great atmosphere - highly recommended
text: Whenever we visit Thessaloniki, we visit this lovely bakery for breakfast. It is just around the corner from where we like to stay in Ladadika.  Today we enjoyed wonderful fresh croissants and orange juice before heading to the airport. We also purchased a really tasty baguette to eat on the plane for lunch.  Ever since we discovered Albeta Bakery two years ago, we have always been impressed by the helpful, friendly, efficient staff and the wide selection of delicious, freshly prepared food.  Albeta Bakery is spotlessly clean with modern decor and cosy seating (inside and outside). It is possible to eat in or take away and we know it is popular with local workers and tourists too.  We always feel very welcome here and look forward to our next trip.

title: Από τα καλύτερα συνοικιακά μαγαζιά!!
text: Επισκεφτηκαμε το μαγαζί 25η Μαρτίου. Παρόλο που είχε πολύ κόσμο η παραγγελία μας έφτασε πολύγρήγορα. Έξτρα παραγγελίες σε πατάτες, αναψυκτικά...More

title: Απρόσμενα καλό μεζεδοπωλείο!
text: Σαββατιάτικη οικογενειακή εξοδος στο Τουρλού. Δεν είχαμε ξαναπάει. Μας είχαν μιλήσει με καλά λογια και είπαμε να το δοκιμάσουμε. Πήγαμε χωρίς κράτηση αλλά μας υποδέχτηκαν πολύ φιλικά και αφού είχε άδεια τραπέζια καθίσαμε μέσα. Μικρό εσωτερικά με καμιά 10ρια τραπέζια αλλά σε σωστές αποστάσεις. Τα μισά είναι ροτόντες κάτι το οποίο είναι πολυ ωραίο για φαγητό. Η Νικολέττα και το προσωπικό πολύ ευγενικοί τηρώντας τα υγειονομικά πρωτόκολλα. Στο δια ταύτα τώρα. Μεγάλη ποικιλία στον κατάλογο με αρκετές επιλογές για όλα τα γούστα. Ότι πήραμε ήταν νόστιμο και καλομαγειρεμένο. Εξαιρετικό κριθαρώτο, κοτοτηγανιά, κεμπαπακια και ανατολίτικο κοτόπουλο. Οι τηγανιτές πατάτες must. Τιμές κανονικές προς χαμηλές. Σίγουρα θα ξαναπάμε.

title: Αντιεπαγγελματικό
text: Δεν ξέρω που βρήκαν οι υπόλοιποι τη "φιλική" εξυπηρέτηση, εμείς πήγαμε Σάββατο βράδυ, δύο άτομα και καθήσαμε σε ένα μικρό τραπέζι που φαινόταν ότι δεν είχε κράτηση καθώς δίπλα ακριβώς υπήρχε άλλο, μεγαλύτερο, με μπουκάλι επάνω. Πέντε λεπτά μετά ένας νεαρός μας ρώτησε πόσα άτομα θα είμαστε και αν χρειαζόμαστε σταχτοδοχείο, και άλλα πέντε λεπτά μετά ήρθε -μάλλον η ιδιοκτήτρια - να μας πει ότι δεν μπορεί να μας εξυπηρετήσει γιατί το τραπέζι ήταν κρατημένο. Που - μέχρι εδώ - είναι ανθρώπινο, κάναν λάθος που δεν έβαλαν ρεζερβέ. Ωστόσο συνέχισε λέγοντας μας ότι θα μπορούσε να μας βολέψει μεν αλλά πέσαν οι κρατήσεις όλες μαζί και αν μείνουμε θα φάμε στις 12 το βράδυ! Αναρωτιέμαι: τα κρατημένα τραπέζια θα τρώγαν κι αυτά στις 12 τη νύχτα; Θα τους έλεγε το ίδιο; Εν ολίγοις: ΜΑΣ ΈΔΙΩΞΑΝ όταν διαπίστωσαν ότι θα είμαστε μόνο δύο άτομα. Δεν θα ξαναπατήσω, εννοείται, ακόμα κι αν είναι άδειο και περιμένει μόνο εμένα...

title: Υπεροχοτατη εμπειρία!
text: Πήγαμε 2 ζευγάρια,παρόλο που ήταν γεμάτο το μαγαζί,είχαμε πολύ καλή εξυπηρέτηση, χαμόγελο,υπέροχα κ νοστιμότατα πιάτα,μυρωδικό ροζέ κρασάκι κ τι κ αν μας πέτυχε η βροχή;;; Αγκαλιά κάτω από την ☂️!!! Μπράβο παιδιά!ήρθε για να μείνει!

title: Νέο Τουρλού
text: Το Τουρλού μεγάλωσε, και μεταφέρθηκε σε πιο ωραίο περιβάλλον αλλά παράλληλα τσίμπησε όχι ανεπαίσθητα σε τιμές, με αισθητά μικρότερες μερίδες και ισως και ποιότητα. Αυτές οι τιμές αντιστοιχούν σε "κανονικές" μερίδες φαγητού και σαλατών, αλλιώς πρόκειται για "μεζεδάκια" και χρειάζεται γενναία αναπροσαρμογη των τιμών αλλιώς των ποσοτήτων. Πάντα φιλικά για ακόμα καλύτερα..

title: Nice
text: Nice setting and panoramic view. Shame that they allow people smoking, it's forbidden all across Europe.....

title: Εξαιρετικό
text: Εξαιρετικά μεγάλη λίστα από γευστικά πιάτα (της ημέρας και καταλόγου) , ευγενικό και χαμογελαστό service.  Ωραία μουσική ακόμη πιο ωραία διακόσμηση.  Φιλική προσέγγιση από τους υπεύθυνους.  Στο τέλος η μους σοκολάτα που θα σας προσφέρουν θα σας εκπλήξει ιδιαίτερα.  Θα επιστρέψω!

title: A great view with cocktails
text: The square was full of people on our day while we had a cocktail. It was a march of protest over something or other.

title: Νόστιμα πιάτα, ωραία ατμόσφαιρα
text: Γευστικότατα πιάτα!!! Ωραίο τσίπουρο Ευγενική εξυπηρέτηση Ζεστή ατμόσφαιρα Σίγουρα θα το ξαναεπισκεφτω!!!

title: Beautiful place but seriously unhealthy
text: It is a lovely decorated beautiful cafe with nice music. The view is lovely! All would be perfect and I would definitely recommend if it wasn’t for the smoking! Laws are not followed in Greece when it comes to smoking indoors! It’s extraordinary and a huge disappointment. Avoid, health hazard!

title: Ψαγμένη κουζίνα, εξαιρετικά υλικά
text: Ψαγμένη κουζίνα, εξαιρετικά υλικά, ωραίο χύμα κρασί, φιλικότατο εξυπηρέτηση! Το συνιστούμε ανεπιφύλακτα, χρειάζεται κράτηση, ίσως και απο την προηγούμενη.

title: Indeed great view
text: This place is really central and you can have a great view of the sea and Aristoleles square from upstairs, having your coffee or a drink. The only reason I dont visit it often is that smoking is allowed and the place is full of smoke! Especially during winter you cant stand it if you are a non smoker. Too pity..

title: Όμορφο
text: Ένα μαγαζάκι μικρό στην Παπαναστασίου ...έχει κάποια ιδιαίτερα πιατα! Είναι γευστικά αλλά δν είναι κ πολύ μεγάλες οι μερίδες ... Πολύ ωραίο πάντως για ποτάκι , μπυριτσα , κρασάκι

title: Does what it says on the tin: Room with a View
text: Not very certain on opening hours, this interesting cafed is located above Olympion cinema. A bit culturelle, but not above what's tolerable and with a nice view.

title: Ιδιαίτερη κουζίνα.
text: Το μαγαζί σίγουρα δε προκαλεί από μόνο του να το επισκεφτεί κάποιος ειδικά βράδυ . Άβολα τραπεζια και καρέκλες, τελείως αδιάφορο περιβάλλον. Αν όμως ανοίξεις τον κατάλογο τα αρνητικά πάνε στην άκρη και τα πράγματα αλλάζουν. Πρωτότυπα πιάτα, πλούσια κάβα, καλό σέρβις, λογικότατες τιμές. Φεύγοντας λες, να ξανάρθω να δοκιμάσω κι άλλα πιάτα. Κι ας είναι το περιβάλλον μόνο για μεσημέρι και για ανδροπαρέες....

title: What a view
text: Located in the heart of the city, on the 5th floor of a beautiful building with a classic cinema, it' s perfect for a coffee after shopping. The customers are mostly young people (college students). Sadly, when it's crowded there is too much noise and smoke.

title: Όλα τέλεια
text: Καταπληκτικοί μεζέδες με πολύ ωραίο και ποιοτικό κρασί.Φυσιολογικές τιμές και οι άνθρωποι που το δουλεύουν πολύ φιλόξενοι. Το μαγαζί έχει χαρακτήρα με αυθεντικές μουσικές ,κάτι που δε συνηθίζεται στις μέρες μας.

title: Nice cafe
text: On the top of Olympion there is this cafe. Great view of Aristotelous square and nice coffee. The prices are normal comparing the location.

title: Great to chill
text: Nice place to have some drinks and chill out while talking with friends; good service and nice drinks

title: Σούπερ Τουρλού
text: Μεζέδες και πιάτα ημέρας εξαιρετικά. Προσεγμένα με σπιτική γεύση. Κρασί κ ρακί σούπερ. Οπουδήποτε καβουρμά τουρλού. Για τους μερακλήδες λουκάνικο μπαρουτ (καυτερό)

title: Underappreciated!
text: Visited twice during the last 2 years and both times were excellent. The first time was late evening for a drink which was well prepared with great atmosphere, Latin music and polite service. Second time it was a little earlier during the day for a coffee. Good coffee and service again and overall a quite environment right in the heart of the city. Make sure to book a table near a window if you visit during popular hours, the view is one of the best in Aristotelous square. Haven't tried the food yet but it's the next item on the list.

title: Young and outstanding
text: A very lively bar to spend an evening with friends. The cocktails are good and reasonably priced. The place had a really positive vibe and great atmosphere - also, the interesting decorum is certainly quite a sight.

title: Εξαιρετικό φαγητό και κρασί
text: Καταπληκτικό φαγητό. Οτι εχουμε παρει τις τελευταίες 3 φορές που έχουμε παει ειναι πεντανόστιμο και ποιοτικοτάτο. Έχει μια πολυ καλη συλλογή απο παραδοσιακα τυρια και πολυ ωραίο λευκο χύμα κρασί. Δοκιμάστε τις πιτες που αναγράφονται στα πιατα ημέρας και θα εκπλαγείτε. Must πιάτο η μελοπιτα! Στο τέλος σερβίρουν και γλυκό κορμο σοκολάτας. Αξιζει πραγματικά!

title: Excellent view!
text: That is if you can find a table near a window. Then you will enjoy your coffee with the e best view in town. Very interesting if you happen to be in the city for the International Film Festival. Then you might meet some international celebrities formteh film industry.

title: Comfy & Pretty
text: Really nice caffe in the heart of the city. Pretty easy to find. Atmosphere is great and the walls are beautifully decorated. Not too loud, in case u wanna have a conversation with a friend. As a Vegan, I had the choice to order a hot chocolate made with almond milk and my friend got a hot apple juice, which I tried and I can safely say, both tasted A-MA-ZING. Definitely ordering the juice next time i'm there.

title: ΒΡΗΚΑΜΕ ΤΟ ΣΤΕΚΙ ΜΑΣ!!!
text: Ομορφο περιβάλλον πολύ καλή εξυπηρέτηση, νόστιμα και ιδιαίτερα πιάτα, πολύ καλή μουσική. Τί άλλο να θέλει κανείς? Μπράβο σας!!!Μένω στην περιοχή και χαίρομαι πολύ που βρήκα ένα μαγαζί που τα συνδυάζει όλα....

title: The view
text: The place is full of character and its view is majestic! Not many cafes in Thessaloniki have such a view. Its only problem is that it's always full, so it's not easy to find a place to sit.

title: Quirky Bar
text: This place in my opinion is one of the best places in the city to go relax and chill on your own or with friends. Its such a relaxing place to visit . The staff are very friendly and polite which is a good start when visiting a place for the first time and is not always the case in the city. This was our first time and will defo be going back for a second and third visit .Going to try it one evening as the cocktail list looked Fab.... It was the ones name day and as we sat down was offered choclates which was a lovely touch .

title: Τσίπουρο και blues
text: Πολύ όμορφο περιβάλλον. Πολύ καλό φαΐ ποιοτικό με υλικά από μικρές μονάδες πολύ καλή ρακή με πολύ καλή μουσική blues - rock. To προσωπικό πολύ φιλικό. Συνίσταται ανεπιφύλακτα

title: "Room with a view" away of the city's noise
text: Warm, friendly, "Room with a view" like storyline of a movie. Over the history of cinema Olympion serves quality coffee and is the ideal place for anyone who wants to chat in relaxed tones and hear great funk, soul, jazz and pop music. The front tables have great view of Aristotelous Square and Thermaikos.

title: Charming Thessaloniki Cafe
text: A must visit if you happen to be in downtown thessaloniki and want a good cup of coffee,lovely homely atmosphere,vintage decor with adorable little touches.Great for animal lovers as pets are allowed.

title: Blues - rock τσιπουρο
text: Πολύ ωραία και νόστιμα πιάτα, όμορφο περιβάλλον. Το σαγανάκι παστουρμα ήταν εξαιρετικο η μουσική πολύ καλή και το προσωπικό φιλικό...More

title: Nice deco, good coffee and service, nice atmosphere
text: Nicely decorated, if you are into the colourful, 50s, ornamental style. Hipsterish. (Good if you like this style, but if you don't). Good coffee, good service. Music was slightly over the top (in terms of volume). Oh, and it would have been much better if it was non-smoking.

title: Που ακούει η καπνιστή πέστροφα Rory Gallagher?? .. στη Χαριλάου.!!
text: 'Ενα ουζερί-οινοπαντοπωλείο για τσίπουρο-ούζο-κρασό κατάσταση και υπέροχα πιάτα... Μικρός και συμπαθητικός ο εσωτερικός χώρος, μεγαλύτερος ο εξωτερικός επί της Παπαναστασίου. Αρκετά μεγάλος κατάλογος για ένα μικρό ουζερί...'Ολα προσεγμένα από μικρούς παραγωγούς της χώρας... όλα καλομαγειρεμένα και νόστιμα !!!! Κορυφαίο πιάτο τα μαυρομάτικα φασόλια με σπανάκι και καπνιστή πέστροφα-παίρνει 10'!!! Δροσερή ανηθοσαλάτα με γιαούρτι και κατσικίσιο τυρί- εξαιρετική και ντελικάτη.. Νόστιμα γιαλαντζί (δύο μερίδες -μία δεν φτάνει), μπριζολάκια με σπάνια μανιτάρια πολύ καλά... Εξυπηρέτηση καλή και επαγγελματική ...  Και όλα αυτά τα απολαμβάνεις ακούγοντας (επιτέλους βρε αδερφέ) καλή rock μουσική και στην ένταση που πρέπει.!!!! Το Τουρλού... στέκι στην ανατολική Θεσσαλονίκη...

title: Great cute gay-friendly bar
text: Very cute bar on a pedestrian street! Nice atmosphere, locals, good service and good coffee. Good during the day and open on Sunday! Loved the funky quirky decoration!

title: αξίζει να το δοκιμάσεις!
text: ζεστό οικογενειακό μαγαζί με σπιτικά πιάτα με φαντασια και εξαιρετικής ποιότητας υλικά.ευγενικοι ιδιοκτητες και προσωπικό..

title: Nice atmosphere but horrible decoration
text: Nice atmosphere , gay friendly coffee , many choices good service and well located but I hated the decoration so kitsh lol
Κάθε μπουκιά και μια μοναδική απόλαυση. Ζεστός μικρός χωρος, ευγενικοί άνθρωποι, υπέροχες γεύσεις που σε ταξιδεύουν.

title: Nice Atmosphere
text: I can call myself a regular to this place from now on. I visit this place every single week. It's a small coffee place, downtown, inside the student area of the city. It's cheap and you'll the atmosphere. The theme of the store is around the 70's or 80's and it's loving. They have a good coffee quality and it's price is low. There are a lot of coffee places in this streets but this one is my favorite.

title: Φαγητό με φιλους
text: Μια ευχάριστη έκπληξη σ ένα μικρό όμορφο χώρο. Ψαγμένα πιάτα ωραία μουσική καλό κρασί και πάνω από όλα....καλοι και ευγενικοί ιδιοκτήτες. Ένα μεγάλο μπράβο!!!!!

title: Nice!
text: Pretty nice and freindly place! Situated in a student area, which is packed with students in the evening and at night. The place is clean and the staff is kind and helpful. The decoration of the place is changing many times per year and it really interesting to see the different ideas the owner has. It's perfect for a coffee early in the evening or for a drink later at night

title: Χαμηλοφωνο garage rock και ξυδατο χταποδι στα καρβουνα... is this heaven? ..που θα λεγε κι ο frank zappa..
text: Η ταλαιπωρημενη χαριλαου απεκτησε επιτελους ενα τσιφτικο στεκι. Αγνα υλικα, οικογενειακη επιχειρηση , ειναι νομιζω αυτη τη στιγμη o top προορισμος για τη νεα γενια {παλιακος ορος ε?} της ανατολικης θεσσαλονικης, και οχι μονο. Τα smart phones δεν λειπουν, αλλα αν τολμησουν οι ιδιοκτητες να εισαγουν την κουλτουρα του κρασιου θα δημιουργηθει παταγος...Αχ αυτη η καχυποψια για τα ποτηρια με ποδι και τα εμφιαλωμενα κρασια επρπεδου που δερνει τους ελληνες. Βοηθηστε ρε παιδια και σεις, Και αναφερομαι σε σχεση με ΟΛΑ τα στεκια, ολης της χωρας.Για τα φαγητα δεν θα πω πολλα ,γιατι δεν θα φτανουν για την παρτη μου. Κοντα τα χερια παντως απο την παντζαροσαλατα με γιαουρτι και πορτοκαλι και την μελιτζανοσαλατα με σταγονιτσες γιαουρτιου και μπαλσαμικο αν θελετε να τα παμε καλα...

title: Satisfied of the visit
text: Very beautiful place, everything was perfect. The salads were big and very taste . The staff was very very friendly. I recommend it :)

title: Blast from the past
text: it is like i am walking in my childhood's home. I hated this decoration, but in Pasta Flora is absolutely great. I am always returning for a coffee or chocolate when i am in town. Don't forget to meet the mascots of the place: Freideriko, Zoi and Issavela

title: Από τα καλύτερα μεζεδοπωλεία στου Χαριλάου
text: Πήγαμε περισσότερο από μία φορά και δοκιμάσαμε αρκετά από τα πιάτα τους! Δεν έχει μεγάλο μενού όμως ότι έχει είναι εξαιρετικό!!!! Τι να πρώτο αναφέρω? Τα υπέροχα τσιγαριστά χόρτα με καβουρμά? την μοναδική τηγανιά με πάπρικα? φοβερές πατατούλες τηγανιτές (με τσαχπινιά στο τηγάνισμα που τις κάνει τραγανές!), ωραία γλώσσα μοσχαρίσια. Δεν χρειάζεται να αναφέρω όλο τον κατάλογο, η ουσία είναι τα πιάτα του καλύπτουν όλα τα γούστα και είναι φτιαγμένα με μεράκι! Το προσωπικό ευγενικό πρόθυμο και χαμογελαστό.Ο μόνος λόγος που δεν το βαθμολόγησα με άριστα είναι το περιβάλλον που έχει πολύ πλαστικό για τα δικά μου γούστα. Ίσως περισσότερες γλάστρες να έκαναν τον χώρο ομορφότερο!

title: Very nice and taste
text: We are very satisfied of our visit there, the salads were very very taste,the staff was also very friendly.Will come back again :)

title: Non-friendly, low quality of service.
text: Went to the place (Karolou Ntil) on a Wednesday night at around 10pm eith my gf and despite there were a few companies sitting there the overall impression from the staff was that the shop was getting prepared to close (3 hours before the actual close time - lol?). Asked for a hot chocolate and got a response that “the coffee/chocolate machines are now shut off”. What a policy!? So I asked the waitress what juices the place had (normally in Greece such shops only have 3-4 basic flavors - not apple - and was interested to know if they had any additional ones) and got the response “whatever juices the market has”. Damn sure if I’d ask for an apple juice we would laugh. My point is, if you want to keep a place until 1am, have polite people to work for you until 1am. If you got a problem with the hours, change it and make it 10pm or something, plus, if you can’t keep your coffee machines on, why have a coffee shop anyway? This place will be my last choice among all the coffee shops in Thessaloniki.

text: I visited this coffee shop with a friend on a Sunday evening to have a cup of coffee or tea and share our news. In the past, this shop used to be one of my favorites, but it has been very long since the last time I was there. I has already noticed, when passing by, the new decoration and style of this coffee shop, aiming to attract students, as it looks like a studying hall. It is still a self service coffee shop, so we ordered a hot chocolate and a cup of coffee and chose to sit on the upper floor, where the only vacant seats were. The tea was extremely hot, so my friend burnt his tongue and was very angry with it. Don't they know that in order to prepare a proper cup of tea the water must not reach the boiling temperature? My chocolate dressed with whipped cream was served without a spoon, which annoyed me. The most irritating issue, though, was that the waiter appeared at 8.45 pm announcing that the upper floor will close in 10 minutes time! I asked him: Are you telling us to leave or will you find us another vacant place in the lower floor? He answered " I do not know, this is not my job...!" However, he did return 5 minutes later to inform and show us a table that had just become vacant. I really did not enjoy my stay at this coffee shop, and i do not look forward to return there. Coffee Lovers enjoy your traditional american coffee, Capuchin, latte or espresso while working or reading or just enjoying the view. You get a password for free wifi! In summer enjoy the wide variety of frappucinos whether coffee based or cream based. They have lovely cheese cakes and cookies that you could enjoy with the coffee too. The only down side is that the service isn't that great.... Servers tend to be a little rude.

title: Love it!

title: Bad service
text: At this particular cafe in Thessaloniki was appalling in comparison to the cafe in the city of Athens . The waitress took soooo long to bring the water the menu and wanted an order before she even gave me one! Was snappy in attitude and only attended the table once whilst there, the rest of the time she stood chatting to a customer about the best hot spots to go to at night and on the weekend instead of checking on her tables. She left the work for the other waiters and it was frustrating to watch that she had a job that someone else could be doing a better job at. I timed her and she actually stood there for 30 minutes I'm not sure why the day manager never got onto her, but made for an unpleasant visit to that particular cafe. The one in town was impeccable and the service more than fantastic. We tipped the boys very well they deserved it. So some good some not so good, just don't choose the ones that don't serve yr coffee in ceramic, coz who warns to drink good coffee out of paper cups whilst yr dining in?

title: Hm...
text: i ll describe and you be the judge.. i went with a friend. it was packed as always but we found a table near the kitchen. the treats they offer are always fresh and delicious. a waiter took our order. a girl brought us the treats. she was not exactly friendly or smiling but i assumed it was because of the workload. at some point we saw the lady who seemed responsible for the preparation of the treats emerge from the lower floor. she looked neat and clean. at her third emergence she was dressed to depart but was carrying a last tray of treats.. on one hand because in the other she was brandishing a lit cigarette! that's right.. it's not enough that they don't abide by the law of forbidding indoor smoking she - the one responsible for what i am to consume - works with a lit cigarette. the fault lies entirely with the management of course. to top this, we had to ask the exact price of our coffee because on the receipt the total was written. the girl who had brought us the treats was closer so we asked her. well, .. bad idea! she was irritated!! or thats the impression she gave when she told us to wait! all in all, the impression i had was that this is an ideal cafe if you are a student who doesnt care so much about how others behave when you pay them... or one of the two individually.

title: Absolutely unacceptable treatment by staff.
text: I entered and said hello to the staff and asked to use the bathroom before I ordered. I was traveling alone and didn't want to leave my stuff behind while I was in the restroom - I do this all the time and have never had a problem. The man working blocked my entrance and told me "no" without any explanation. I further explained that I was going to order a coffee, I just wanted to use the bathroom before I sat down. I tried to explain and make him see that I wanted to order something and stay there but he literally stood by the door holding the door open, motioning for me to leave. He then got angry at me, raising his voice to me and telling me, literally, these words: "this café is different, this place is not for you." From that, I'm guessing he was angry with me because I'm a tourist and I don't speak Greek. I understand 100% a place wanting you to place an order before you use their bathroom but he didn't even give me an opportunity to order and actually kicked me out of the café, embarrassing me in front of all the other guest there. I've traveled to 60 countries in my life and work in the travel industry, and I have never been kicked out of an establishment before even having a chance to order. The man who was working the day of writing this (January 7th) is a complete embarrassment to hospitality and deserves to lose his job or his business if this is how he believes its acceptable to treat customers. An absolute joke. His rudeness ruined my entire day and nearly left me in tears.

title: Overpriced, average food.

Others drinks like the chocolate milk (€5.50!) are rich in chocolate, but the balance is off which makes it too heavy to drink.  I would say overall the menu is way overpriced. Just go one street parallel and get much better value for money.  Did not try any of the alcoholic drinks, in which they might be better.

title: Horrific treatment by staff
text: My husband and I were stopping for a cup of coffee. As I often do, I headed first for the restroom while he found us a seat outside. As I was entering the restroom a male employee grabbed my bag by the strap and used it to yank me out of the restroom. He then pushed himself in front of me to close the bathroom door and told me, “This is not for you.” I said my husband was getting a table that I was a customer and the man gestured for me to leave and said “This is not that kind of place,” before turning his back to me and holding his hand up in my face while doing so. I am an educated professional in her early forties, and was dressed in long black pants, a blouse, and walking shoes. I have never been treated so rudely in a place of business and the experience was humiliating. There was no call for it. People may like the food and drinks, but watch your back if you try to wash your hands before sitting down to enjoy them.

We ate there twice, thinking that the over-salting of 3 of our 4 dishes the first night (the fried squid was perfect) would hardly happen again. Next night all four (2 starters, 2 mains) were at least equally over-salted. A mushroom risotto was beautifully flavoured but the overlay of salt made it impossible to finish. Seafood pasta was almost the same. I can only speculate that the chef is a very heavy smoker and so his taste buds need this crazy level of over-seasoning to register. A pity as otherwise the place would be terrific.

title: Don't come as a solo
text: Today I attempted to have coffee at this café. As I did not end up having coffee I can only comment on the service. Upon entering this virtually empty café at around 9.30am this morning, I sat in street view seat enjoying the sun before it became too hot. A waiter came over and I gave him my order. He then asked if I was waiting for anyone else which I wasn't. I was then informed that all outside seating is reserved for parties of two or more. Having asked where the single person seating was and informed that it was inside, I made my decision to leave. If this is the company policy then maybe signage informing potential patrons would be helpful. It is also nice to know that the Greek economy does not require the tourism euros of a single travel without children, a mortgage or car repayments. The taxpayers of Europe can breath a sigh of relief that another ECB/IMF bailout is not required.
